translation.en: In New York City, there's a fine line between law and chaos.
translation.zh: 在纽约，法律与混乱之间有一条细致的界线

translation.en: On that line live Danson and Highsmith.
translation.zh: 丹森和海史密斯生活在那条线上

translation.en: Tell me again why I decided to get on this roof!
translation.zh: 再跟我说说我怎么会决定上到车顶来！

translation.en: I think you can chalk that up to bad life choices.
translation.zh: 我想你可以把那当作糟糕的生活选择

translation.en: Get rid of that asshole.
translation.zh: 甩掉那个混蛋 -啊-哦！-我讨厌你说"啊-哦！"

translation.en: I hate it when you say:
translation.zh: -啊-哦！-我讨厌你说"啊-哦！"

translation.en: Dude, you put a ding in my hood!
translation.zh: 伙计，你在我车蓬上打了个洞

translation.en: Come on with it, then!
translation.zh: 那就继续吧！

translation.en: Whoa, hey!
translation.zh: 哇哦，嘿！

translation.en: That's trouble.
translation.zh: 有麻烦了

translation.en: Did someone call Nine-One-holy-shit?
translation.zh: 有人打过9-1-狗-屎？

translation.en: That's it. I'm sick of all this running.
translation.zh: 就这样，我已经受够了这次逃跑

translation.en: Hang on!
translation.zh: 坐稳！

translation.en: You have the right to remain silent!
translation.zh: 你有权保持沉默！

translation.en: But I wanna hear you scream!
translation.zh: 但我想听你尖叫！

translation.en: Down on the ground!
translation.zh: 趴到地上去！

translation.en: Detective! Yeah, yeah! Detective!
translation.zh: 警探！耶！警探！

translation.en: One at a time, all right?
translation.zh: 一次一人，好吗？

translation.en: Yeah, detectives, Rick Grayson, New York Observer Online.
translation.zh: 是的，警探，我是瑞克格瑞森来自《纽约观察者》在线

translation.en: These suspects were caught with a quarter pound of marijuana...
translation.zh: 这些嫌疑犯仅仅是因为四分之一磅的大麻

translation.en: ...a misdemeanor.
translation.zh: 和在一些州有不正当行为而被捕

translation.en: Do you think this arrest was worth 12 million in property damages?
translation.zh: 你认为付出一千两百万的财产损失而进行这次逮捕值得吗？

translation.en: Why don't we let New York City answer that question?
translation.zh: 我们为什么不让纽约市来回答那个问题呢？

translation.en: The greatest city on Earth, yeah!
translation.zh: 世界上最棒的城市，耶！

translation.en: Hi, Sarah Gapone from TMZ print edition.
translation.zh: 嘿，《TMZ》印刷版的萨拉盖鹏

translation.en: Danson, are the rumors about you and Kim Kardashian true?
translation.zh: 丹森，关于你和金卡戴珊的传言是真的吗？

translation.en: No comment.
translation.zh: 无可奉告

translation.en: But, yes.
translation.zh: 但是，是的

translation.en: Danson and Highsmith, free hot dogs for life!
translation.zh: 丹森和海史密斯免费热狗永久提供！

translation.en: No drinks. No drinks. I can't do it. I can't do it.
translation.zh: 没有饮料，没有饮料我做不到，我做不到

translation.en: Danson and Highsmith shoot, drive, and sex with style. They're rock stars.
translation.zh: 丹森和海史密斯开枪、驾车和时尚人士上床，他们是摇滚明星

translation.en: Then you got your jokers, your ball busters, your vets...
translation.zh: 然后你有你的笑星，你的对手你的退役老警察

translation.en: ...and the other guys.
translation.zh: ...还有其他人

translation.en: We know, we know. We know.
translation.zh: 我们知道

translation.en: All right, all right. Listen up, listen up!
translation.zh: 好吧听着！

translation.en: We're having a celebration tonight at Butter.
translation.zh: 我们今晚在巴特庆祝一下

translation.en: Brody Jenner's gonna be there. Bai Ling.
translation.zh: 布洛迪金纳会来，白灵

translation.en: -That little short bitch from Jersey Shore. -Yeah!
translation.zh: -演《泽西海岸》的那个矮个婊子-耶！

translation.en: And most of you are on the list.
translation.zh: 你们大部分人都在宾客名单上

translation.en: You're the best.
translation.zh: 你最棒了

translation.en: Guys, I'm gonna say something right now.
translation.zh: 伙计们，现在我要说点事情

translation.en: About a man who came from Austria with a dream.
translation.zh: 是关于一个从奥地利来的怀揣梦想的人

translation.en: -Arnold Schwarzenegger! -Let me finish.
translation.zh: -阿诺德施瓦辛格！-让我说完

translation.en: He became a champion and then a movie star.
translation.zh: 他成为了冠军然后是一个电影明星，是吧？

translation.en: -Arnold Schwarzenegger! -God damn it, let me...
translation.zh: -阿诺德施瓦辛格-妈的，让我...

translation.en: They ruined the story.
translation.zh: 他们把故事给毁了他们把故事给毁了

translation.en: Let.... What.... The point is...
translation.zh: 让...什么...要点在于

translation.en: ...we couldn't do our job if it weren't for you doing the paperwork...
translation.zh: 我们无法完成我们的工作如果不是你们完成所有的文书工作

translation.en: ...answering phones, and all that stupid shit.
translation.zh: 接电话，做了那些我们不喜欢做的愚蠢事情

translation.en: All the gun fights, all the car chases...
translation.zh: 所有的枪战，所有的追车

translation.en: ...all the sex we don't wanna have with women, but we have to...
translation.zh: 和那些我们不喜欢却又没办法的女人上床

translation.en: ...all due to what you guys do. Thank you.
translation.zh: 和那些我们不喜欢却又没办法的女人上床 所有都是你们的功劳，谢谢

translation.en: -And we'd do it again and again. -Hey, you shut your face!
translation.zh: 我们会一直做下去 嘿，安静点！

translation.en: If we wanna hear you talk...
translation.zh: 如果我们想听你讲话

translation.en: ...I will shove my arm up your ass and work your mouth like a puppet!
translation.zh: 我会猛推你的屁股让你的嘴像只小狗一样！

translation.en: You hear me? You hear me?
translation.zh: 你听见了吗？你听见了吗？

translation.en: -Cash bar. -Yeah.
translation.zh: -现金酒吧-耶

translation.en: Peace out, bitches.
translation.zh: 再见，伙计们

translation.en: Hey, fellas. All right, bring it in.
translation.zh: 嘿，伙计们，来吧，过来

translation.en: Come on. Bring it in a little bit. All right, right there.
translation.zh: 来，再过来点 好的，就那里

translation.en: Just back up, just like right there.
translation.zh: 往后，就在那儿

translation.en: All right, just one.... Just a.... There you go, right there. Right there.
translation.zh: 好的，就一...就一... 就这样，就那儿，就那儿

translation.en: This is their paperwork. They're not gonna do it.
translation.zh: 这是他们的文书工作你们知道他们不会做的

translation.en: That's right. This paperwork is like Bob's wife here.
translation.zh: 是的这就像是鲍勃的老婆

translation.en: It's thick, ugly, got Danson's fingerprints all over it.
translation.zh: 厚重，丑陋上面是丹森的手指印

translation.en: -No offense. -That's all right.
translation.zh: -没有冒犯的意思，鲍勃-没关系

translation.en: -Anyway, now who wants it? -I do!
translation.zh: -总之，现在谁想要？-我！

translation.en: All right! Paper Bitch and Yankee Clipper on the case!
translation.zh: 好的！文书家伙和扬基射手来接手！

translation.en: -Nice work. Thanks. -Thank you.
translation.zh: -干得好，谢谢，艾伦-谢谢，队长

translation.en: "I'll do it! I'll do it!"
translation.zh: "我来做！我来做！"

translation.en: Stop humming that song!
translation.zh: 别哼那个曲子了！

translation.en: -I can hum if I want to. -No, I know you can.
translation.zh: -如果我想我就可以哼-不，我知道你可以

translation.en: I'm asking you to stop.
translation.zh: 我是叫你停下来

translation.en: -If you're asking, then I'll stop. -Thank you.
translation.zh: -嗯，如果你是在请求我，那么我不哼了-谢谢

translation.en: Could you not smile like that?
translation.zh: 你能不那样笑吗？

translation.en: You're asking me to mask my emotions because of how it makes you feel.
translation.zh: 现在因为我的表情让你感觉不爽你就叫我隐藏我的情绪

translation.en: That I will not do.
translation.zh: 我不会那样做

translation.en: Seriously, stop humming! Okay?
translation.zh: 认真地，不要哼了！好吗？

translation.en: This isn't accounting or wherever...
translation.zh: 这不是会计部或者其他什么

translation.en: ...you and your little pocket calculator were transferred from.
translation.zh: 你和你的口袋计算器被调来的鬼地方

translation.en: Forensic accounting, okay. And it's an important part of the job.
translation.zh: 是法医会计部那是工作中很重要的一部分

translation.en: Yeah, whatever. Stop being so overtly happy about doing shit work, you moron.
translation.zh: 耶，管他的，别为了做这种狗屎工作而公然得意了，你个笨蛋

translation.en: Hey, guys. Reminder.
translation.zh: 嘿，伙计们，提个醒

translation.en: The police union picnic's coming up this weekend.
translation.zh: 这星期有警员工会聚餐

translation.en: My wife's making her famous deviled eggs, again. My waistline's furious.
translation.zh: 我老婆又要做她有名的芥末鸡蛋了我的腰围要发怒了

translation.en: It's a bad time, Bob!
translation.zh: 时候不对，鲍勃！

translation.en: All right.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: Going to get a slice.
translation.zh: 去吃一份

translation.en: You know what I just did?
translation.zh: 你知道我刚刚做什么了吗？

translation.en: I walked out that door, saw a couple detectives...
translation.zh: 我刚刚走出那扇门看见一群警探

translation.en: ...and I was about to start bad mouthing you...
translation.zh: 我刚要在背后说些你的坏话

translation.en: ...but I stopped myself, because my pops taught me...
translation.zh: 但是我停了下来因为我爸跟我说

translation.en: ...that a man who talks behind somebody's back is a coward.
translation.zh: 在别人背后说坏话的人是懦夫

translation.en: Wow, I appreciate that.
translation.zh: 哇哦，我十分感谢

translation.en: Good, I'm gonna tell you to your face.
translation.zh: 好，因为我要当面对你说

translation.en: -No. You don't have to. -No, I don't like you.
translation.zh: -不，你不需要-不，我不喜欢你

translation.en: I think you're a fake cop.
translation.zh: 我觉得你是个假警察

translation.en: The sound of your piss hitting the urinal? It sounds feminine.
translation.zh: 你小便落在便池里的声音？听起来很娘

translation.en: If we were in the wild, I would attack you.
translation.zh: 如果我们在野外，我会攻击你

translation.en: Even if you weren't in my food chain, I would go out of my way to attack you.
translation.zh: 即使你不在我的食物链上我也会攻击你

translation.en: If I were a lion, and you were a tuna...
translation.zh: 如果我是头狮子，而你是只金枪鱼

translation.en: ...I would swim out in the ocean and freaking eat you!
translation.zh: 我会游在大海中突然吃了你！

translation.en: And then I'd bang your tuna girlfriend.
translation.zh: 然后我会猛干你的金枪鱼女友

translation.en: Okay, first off, a lion swimming in the ocean?
translation.zh: 好吧，首先一头狮子在海里游泳？

translation.en: Lions don't like water.
translation.zh: 狮子不喜欢水

translation.en: If you'd placed it near a river or some sort of fresh water source, that'd make sense.
translation.zh: 如果是在河边或者其他水源边上那才说得通

translation.en: But you find yourself in the ocean, 20-foot waves...
translation.zh: 但是你发现自己在海里6米高的海浪

translation.en: ...I'm assuming it's off the coast of South Africa...
translation.zh: 我想那是在南非的海岸

translation.en: ...coming up against a full-grown, 800-pound tuna with his 20 or 30 friends?
translation.zh: 和一条成熟的，800磅重的金枪鱼以及它的二三十个朋友对着干？

translation.en: You lose that battle.
translation.zh: 你会输的

translation.en: You lose that battle nine times out of ten. And guess what.
translation.zh: 你百分之九十会输猜怎么着？

translation.en: You've wandered into our school of tuna, and we now have a taste of lion.
translation.zh: 你在我们的金枪鱼族群里漫步过我们现在要尝狮子的味道

translation.en: We've talked to ourselves. We've communicated.
translation.zh: 我们跟自己说我们内部交流

translation.en: -Yeah? -And said, "You know what?
translation.zh: -是吗？-说："你知道吗？"

translation.en: "Lion tastes good. Let's go get some more lion."
translation.zh: "狮子味道不错我们要吃更多狮子"

translation.en: We've developed a system to establish a beachhead...
translation.zh: 我们建立一个系统建立滩头阵地

translation.en: ...and aggressively hunt you and your family.
translation.zh: 捕食你和你的家人

translation.en: And we will corner your pride...
translation.zh: 我们将把你的荣耀

translation.en: -...your children. -How you gonna do that?
translation.zh: -你的孩子，你的后代逼入困境-你打算怎么做？

translation.en: We will construct a series of breathing apparatus with kelp.
translation.zh: 我们会建造一系列带有大型海藻的呼吸设备

translation.en: We will be able to trap certain amounts of oxygen.
translation.zh: 我们能够集聚氧气

translation.en: It's not gonna be days at a time, but an hour, hour 45, no problem.
translation.zh: 不会一次足够几天使用但是一个小时，一小时45分钟，没有问题

translation.en: That will give us enough time to figure out where you live...
translation.zh: 那会给我们足够的时间找到你住在哪里

translation.en: ...go back to the sea, get more oxygen, and then stalk you.
translation.zh: 回到海里，获得更多的氧气然后追踪你

translation.en: You just lost at your own game. You're outgunned and outmanned.
translation.zh: 你在属于你自己的游戏上输了在武器和人数上你被击败了

translation.en: Did that go the way you thought it was gonna go?
translation.zh: 那是不是正如你所想呢？

translation.en: Nope.
translation.zh: 不

translation.en: Two minutes before the markets open...
translation.zh: 开市两分钟前

translation.en: ...Pamela Boardman, CEO of Lendl Global, ringing the opening bell.
translation.zh: 帕米拉鲍德曼，兰德环球的首席执行官敲响了开市钟 帕米拉鲍德曼兰德环球的CEO

translation.en: With Boardman is investment banker, David Ershon...
translation.zh: 和鲍德曼在一起的是投资银行家戴维厄肖

translation.en: ...who manages 40 percent of Lendl's $70-billion equity pool.
translation.zh: 管理着兰德公司市值700亿美元的股权的40%

translation.en: How much did we lose?
translation.zh: 我们损失了多少？

translation.en: You may ring the bell now, Ms. Boardman.
translation.zh: 你现在可以敲钟了，鲍德曼女士

translation.en: -Thirty-two. -Million?
translation.zh: -32-三千两百万？

translation.en: No, billion.
translation.zh: 不，三百二十亿

translation.en: Shit!
translation.zh: 妈的！

translation.en: Chinatown. Three Triad gang members. I popped two of them off the draw.
translation.zh: 开枪的警员的听话会-纽约市警察局 唐人街，三名三合会成员我一拔出枪就放倒两个

translation.en: -Bang, bang. -Yeah.
translation.zh: -砰，砰-耶

translation.en: -Then I raise up to take the leader out. -Shit, I feel like I'm there.
translation.zh: 然后我站起身来抓那个头头 妈的，我觉得自己身在现场

translation.en: I hear a whistle. My partner's on the roof.
translation.zh: 我听到一声口哨，我的搭档在房顶

translation.en: He says, "Let's even the odds!"
translation.zh: 他说，"让我们公平点！"

translation.en: He tosses me down a Mossberg pump. I send one through his chest.
translation.zh: 他给我扔下来一把莫斯伯格枪我一枪打穿了他的胸腔

translation.en: Game over, bitches.
translation.zh: 完事了，伙计们

translation.en: -All right. -Yeah.
translation.zh: -好的-耶

translation.en: Jimmy? Let's talk about how that story made you feel.
translation.zh: 吉米？让我们来说说那个故事给你怎样的感觉

translation.en: Like a Viagra pill with a face.
translation.zh: 像伟哥一样让我感觉兴奋

translation.en: I know it's very tempting.
translation.zh: 我知道这很诱人

translation.en: You want to impress your friends.
translation.zh: 你想给你的朋友们留下深刻的印象

translation.en: But this is serious stuff we're dealing with, okay?
translation.zh: 但我们在讨论严肃的事情，好吗？

translation.en: This is firing your weapon in the line of duty.
translation.zh: 是你在执勤的时候开火了

translation.en: Officer Hoitz?
translation.zh: 霍伊茨警官？

translation.en: Oh, man.
translation.zh: 哦，天啊

translation.en: Would you like to share?
translation.zh: 能来分享一下你的故事吗？

translation.en: No, I'd rather not.
translation.zh: 不，我不愿意

translation.en: Officer Hoitz, you've been coming here for six months...
translation.zh: 霍伊茨警官，你来这儿已经有六个月了

translation.en: ...and you haven't said a word.
translation.zh: 你从来没有讲过什么

translation.en: This is a safe environment, no judgment here.
translation.zh: 这是个安全的环境没有评价

translation.en: Douche bag.
translation.zh: 没用的家伙

translation.en: That's judgment, Jimmy. Come on.
translation.zh: 那是评价，吉米，拜托

translation.en: I relive it every night.
translation.zh: 我每晚都会回想起来

translation.en: Bronx, October.
translation.zh: 布朗克斯，十月

translation.en: Game 7 of the World Series.
translation.zh: 世界系列赛的第七场

translation.en: For all the marbles. High pressure, unruly crowd, and I pulled tunnel duty.
translation.zh: 所有的弹子，高度压力失控的人群，我负责地道

translation.en: I saw a shadowy figure in the tunnel. I told him to stop.
translation.zh: 我是说，我在地道里看见一个阴影我叫他停下来

translation.en: Whoa, whoa, this is a restricted area!
translation.zh: 哇哦，这是封锁区！

translation.en: Finally pulled my gun. He started running at me.
translation.zh: 最后我拔出枪 拔出了致命的武器他朝我跑过来

translation.en: Don't make me shoot! I'll do it!
translation.zh: 别逼我开枪！我会开枪的！

translation.en: Are you deaf? You hear me yell, "Freeze"?
translation.zh: 你聋了吗？你听见我喊，"别动"？

translation.en: You dick! I'm Derek Jeter! You shot me!
translation.zh: 你混球！我是德瑞克基特！你开枪打我！

translation.en: -You cost me 20 grand on that game! -Douche bag.
translation.zh: -你让我那场比赛输了两万块！-没用的家伙

translation.en: Cost the city a championship.
translation.zh: 让纽约输掉了冠军

translation.en: I was being groomed for a top position in homicide.
translation.zh: 我被训练成警局里最有前途的警员

translation.en: Now I'm stuck with a desk jockey. Everybody calls me the Yankee Clipper.
translation.zh: 现在我和共用一张桌子的家伙关系很僵大家都叫我扬基射手

translation.en: Because you shot Derek Jeter!
translation.zh: 因为你朝德瑞克基特开了枪！

translation.en: He's a biracial angel.
translation.zh: 他是天使

translation.en: You should've shot A-Rod.
translation.zh: 你应该朝阿历克斯罗德里格斯开枪

translation.en: Yo, Paper Bitch.
translation.zh: 嘿，文书家伙

translation.en: -What's up, man? -Hey. Hey, guys.
translation.zh: -怎么了，伙计？-嘿，伙计们

translation.en: -Paper Bitch. -Paper Bitch.
translation.zh: -文书家伙-文书家伙

translation.en: I don't like that. I know you guys think it's fun.
translation.zh: 其实我不喜欢那个称呼 我知道你们认为那很有意思但是我不喜欢那个名字

translation.en: Still working on the Danson and Highsmith paperwork?
translation.zh: 还在写丹森和海史密斯的材料吗？

translation.en: -Shit. -No, actually, actually, that's....
translation.zh: -妈的-不，事实上，那是...

translation.en: What is this? That looks stupid.
translation.zh: 这是什么？看起来真蠢

translation.en: Guys, it's illegal permitting for construction. Specifically, scaffolding.
translation.zh: 伙计们，这是违章建筑准确地说，脚手架

translation.en: Some of the guys were talking.
translation.zh: 有人说话了

translation.en: They were like, "How come you've never fired your weapon in the office before?"
translation.zh: 他们像是问："你怎么从来没在办公室里开过枪呢？"

translation.en: Good point.
translation.zh: 说得好

translation.en: I'm sorry, I don't follow.
translation.zh: 不好意思，我没明白

translation.en: -You've never fired in the office. -We all have. It's called a desk pop.
translation.zh: 你从来没有在办公室里开过枪 我们都开过，你知道那叫办公桌开枪

translation.en: -Fellas, I know you don't respect me. -Not true.
translation.zh: 伙计们，看，我明白你们并不尊重我这样一个警官

translation.en: I'm not stupid. I'm not gonna discharge my firearm in the office.
translation.zh: -不是的-我不蠢 我不会在办公室里开枪

translation.en: Listen. I'll try to make it clear.

translation.en: -Yeah. -Yeah. I could see it.

translation.en: -How do you get that from anything I said? -Hey, guys! Soup's on.
translation.zh: 你是怎么从我刚才所说的那些东西里知道这些的？ 嘿，伙计们！汤来了

translation.en: What do you mean?

translation.en: Hi.

translation.en: -Hi. -You must be Terry.
translation.zh: -嗨-你一定是特里

translation.en: -Who are you? -I'm Dr. Sheila Gamble, his wife.

translation.en: -Come on, seriously. Who is that? -His old lady.
translation.zh: -说吧，认真地，那是谁？-他的老女人

translation.en: I know you're working. I'm so sorry.
translation.zh: 我知道你在工作，对不起

translation.en: I gave my love to Erin
translation.zh: 我把爱给了爱瑞茵

translation.en: She promised to be true
translation.zh: 她发誓说那是真的

translation.en: I went to war to come back
translation.zh: 我从战场回来

translation.en: And find five British soldiers
translation.zh: 发现五个英国士兵

translation.en: Had their way with her
translation.zh: 和她有关系

translation.en: It was consensual
translation.zh: 是双方一致同意的

translation.en: Done?
translation.zh: 唱完了？

translation.en: Gretchel and Dawson Accounting Firm in New Jersey...
translation.zh: 格雷彻和道森会计公司在费尔劳恩，新泽西

translation.en: ...has only one client, David Ershon.
translation.zh: 只有一个客户，戴维厄肖

translation.en: Pretty rinky-dink operation for a guy like that.
translation.zh: 对于那样的家伙来说真是个小生意

translation.en: We're going to Jersey to visit an accounting firm.
translation.zh: 看来我们要去泽西拜访一家会计公司了

translation.en: That's a shitty day.
translation.zh: 差劲的一天

translation.en: And all their fathers were hanged
translation.zh: 他们的父亲都被绞死

translation.en: And the children all got pink eye
translation.zh: 他们的父亲都被绞死 孩子们都是粉色的眼睛

translation.en: While their Harry Potter books Were burned
translation.zh: 而他们的《哈利波特》书被烧毁了

translation.en: Do you have fun singing those? They're depressing.
translation.zh: 你唱那些歌有意思吗？听上去很压抑

translation.en: I do. They're full of rich history.
translation.zh: 有意思，它们中蕴含着丰富的历史

translation.en: Damn it, I'm late. I was supposed to meet my lady.
translation.zh: 妈的，我要迟到了我应该去见我女朋友的

translation.en: I thought you said you guys split up.
translation.zh: 我认为你说你们分手了

translation.en: Let's just keep our thing about work, okay?
translation.zh: 我们只谈工作，好吗？

translation.en: All right. Goodbye, buddy.
translation.zh: 好吧，再见，伙计

translation.en: Hey, get off me, man.
translation.zh: 嘿，把手拿开，伙计

translation.en: What the hell are you doing?
translation.zh: 你究竟在做什么？

translation.en: I'm dancing, Terry. What the hell are you doing here?
translation.zh: 我在跳舞，特里你在这儿做什么？

translation.en: I love you, Francine.
translation.zh: 我爱你，弗朗辛

translation.en: If you were with me, you wouldn't be here shaking it for dollar bills!
translation.zh: 如果你和我在一起，你不会在脱衣舞俱乐部，为了钞票扭动

translation.en: This is a ballet studio, Terry. Okay? These poles are horizontal.
translation.zh: 这是一间芭蕾舞室，特里好吗？这些杆子是水平的

translation.en: He loves you very much, Francine.
translation.zh: 他非常爱你，弗朗辛

translation.en: -Who is this guy? -What are you doing here, Allen?
translation.zh: -这人是谁？-你来这儿做什么，艾伦？

translation.en: It's the code. I'm your partner.
translation.zh: 搭档的规矩，我是你的搭档

translation.en: I'm here to support a friend and a work colleague.
translation.zh: 我来支持一个朋友、一个同事

translation.en: Is this guy bothering you?
translation.zh: 弗朗辛，这个人在骚扰你吗？

translation.en: Who's this, your new boyfriend? Great. A new boyfriend.
translation.zh: 这人是谁，你的新男朋友？好啊，你有了新男朋友

translation.en: He is my dance partner, Terry. Okay?
translation.zh: 他是我的舞伴，特里，好吗？

translation.en: I know that this is a big surprise...
translation.zh: 我知道这是个很大的惊喜

translation.en: ...but there are other things besides being a cop. Okay?
translation.zh: 但是除了当警察之外世界上有其他的东西，好吗？

translation.en: Now, if you will excuse me, I'm gonna dance.
translation.zh: 现在，请恕我离开，我去跳舞了

translation.en: You don't think I can do this shit?
translation.zh: 什么，你认为我不能做这个？

translation.en: That was surprisingly good, Terry.
translation.zh: 那真是令人惊奇地棒，特里

translation.en: -I love you, Francine. -You don't know what love is.
translation.zh: -我爱你，弗朗辛-你不知道爱是什么

translation.en: He loves you very much, Francine!
translation.zh: 他非常爱你，弗朗辛！

translation.en: I heard it when he said it. Thank you.
translation.zh: 他说的时候我听见了，谢谢你

translation.en: You know what you're doing? You're killing me.
translation.zh: 你知道你在对我做什么吗？你让我心痛

translation.en: And don't eyeball me!
translation.zh: 别那样看我，伙计！

translation.en: Running around with this drug addict?
translation.zh: 你要和这个露着股沟的瘾君子在一起吗？

translation.en: Terry!
translation.zh: 特里！

translation.en: He does not approve of your behavior!
translation.zh: 他不认可你的行为！

translation.en: Can you please go?
translation.zh: 你可以离开吗？

translation.en: And you too, creepy guy standing in the door?
translation.zh: 你也是站在门口的怪人？

translation.en: Let's go, Allen.
translation.zh: 我们走，艾伦

translation.en: I think we all experienced our own ballet today.
translation.zh: 我想我们今天都体验了属于自己的芭蕾

translation.en: The ballet of emotion and feelings.
translation.zh: 情感和感受的芭蕾

translation.en: You're kind of making things worse.
translation.zh: 你把事情弄得更糟

translation.en: -You okay? -Yeah, I'm fine.
translation.zh: -你还好吗？-是的，我很好

translation.en: Hey, I didn't know you could dance.
translation.zh: 嘿，我不知道你会跳舞

translation.en: We used to do those moves to make fun of guys...
translation.zh: 当我们还是孩子的时候我们用那些舞蹈动作来取笑别人

translation.en: ...show them how queer they were, okay?
translation.zh: 来表现他们是多么奇怪，好吗？

translation.en: -You learned to dance sarcastically? -Yeah, I guess.
translation.zh: -你就是那样讽刺地学习跳舞？-我想是的

translation.en: Stay out of my personal life, okay? The kid flies private.
translation.zh: 离我的私生活远一点，好吗？孩子需要隐私

translation.en: Stay focused on the case, man. I'll see you in Jersey tomorrow.
translation.zh: 集中精力到案子上，伙计明天泽西见

translation.en: All right, Terry.
translation.zh: 好的，特里

translation.en: Hey, that was liberating for me. I don't know how it felt for you.
translation.zh: 嘿，对我来说有解放感我不清楚你的感觉怎样

translation.en: Here, check this out. Article from six months ago.
translation.zh: 这里，看这个六个月以前的报道

translation.en: Talking about how the lottery is looking...
translation.zh: 谈论彩票如何更激进地寻求

translation.en: ...to invest their $30-billion fund more aggressively.
translation.zh: 进行300亿美元的投资 彩票追求更高回报

translation.en: So he's dealing drugs?
translation.zh: 那么他是在贩毒吗？

translation.en: No, it's not drugs. This isn't Miami Vice.
translation.zh: 不，这不是毒品，这不是《迈阿密风云》

translation.en: Hey, I got you a gift.
translation.zh: 嘿，我有个礼物给你

translation.en: I just saw something, and I thought of you, and so, I don't want it to be weird.
translation.zh: 我刚才看见些东西，我想到你于是，我不想它看起来有些奇怪

translation.en: -I just wanted to be nice. -Of course it's weird.
translation.zh: 我只是想友好些 这当然奇怪

translation.en: It's a grown man giving another man a present.
translation.zh: 一个成年男人给另一个男人一份礼物

translation.en: There you go. Open it up.
translation.zh: 给你，打开它

translation.en: It's okay, you're welcome.
translation.zh: 好吧，别客气

translation.en: I like to do things like that.
translation.zh: 我喜欢做那样的事情

translation.en: Take a look what it says.
translation.zh: 看看说些什么

translation.en: "FBI. Female body inspector."
translation.zh: 联邦调查局女性身体检查员

translation.en: You know, because we're both in law enforcement.
translation.zh: 你知道因为我们都在执法部门

translation.en: We both like women.
translation.zh: 我们都喜欢女人

translation.en: But I got a weird sense of humor. I'm a sick puppy.
translation.zh: 但我有着怪异的幽默感我是只病狗

translation.en: I can't look at it. It makes me laugh so hard.
translation.zh: 我没法看着它，它让我大笑

translation.en: Me too.
translation.zh: 我也是

translation.en: Real nice. You know, it's all class.
translation.zh: 真的很棒，你知道，真是经典

translation.en: -Okay. -Don't do that anymore.
translation.zh: -好吧-别再干这样的事了

translation.en: Yeah, believe me, I won't.
translation.zh: 是的，相信我，我不会做了

translation.en: Do you understand what's so funny about it, though?
translation.zh: 那么你知道它什么地方那么有趣吗？

translation.en: Because it's the FBI, right? It has the same logo, the same shield.
translation.zh: 是联邦调查局，是吗？有同样的标识，同样的盾牌

translation.en: And at first glance, you're like, it's a mug that says "FBI."
translation.zh: 乍看上去，就像是写着"联邦调查局"的杯子

translation.en: But then at second glance, you're like, "Female Body Inspector"?
translation.zh: 但仔细看看写着"女性身体检查员"？

translation.en: Get out of town. This is outrageous--
translation.zh: 难以置信，这真令人惊讶...

translation.en: Shut up!
translation.zh: 闭嘴！

translation.en: I'm gonna climb over that anger wall of yours...
translation.zh: 我要在这段日子里的某天

translation.en: ...one of these days, and it's gonna be glorious.
translation.zh: 越过你生气的墙 那将是一种荣耀

translation.en: Shouldn't we tell Mauch that we're going?
translation.zh: 我们不应该告诉毛奇我们要去调查这个地方吗？

translation.en: -We're just going to check it out. -I know, but it's procedure.
translation.zh: 为什么？我们只是去查查看 我知道，但是这是程序

translation.en: Terry answers to no one.
translation.zh: 特里不回答任何人

translation.en: I do what I do.
translation.zh: 我做我做的事情

translation.en: What accounting firm is closed at 11 a.m. on a Tuesday?
translation.zh: 什么样的会计公司会在星期二上午11:00就关门了？

translation.en: This is a shithole.
translation.zh: 这是个屎坑

translation.en: I love bombs.
translation.zh: 我爱炸弹

translation.en: I can't hear! I can't hear!
translation.zh: 我听不到了！我听不到了！

translation.en: There's blood blisters on my hands!
translation.zh: 我手上有血泡！

translation.en: Oh, my God!
translation.zh: 哦，上帝！

translation.en: How do they walk away in movies without flinching when it explodes behind them?
translation.zh: 在电影里，当炸弹在他们身后爆炸的时候 他们是怎么做到毫不退缩地走开的？

translation.en: There's no way! I call bullshit on that!
translation.zh: 这不可能！我叫那胡扯！

translation.en: When they flew the Millennium Falcon outside of the Death Star...
translation.zh: 当他们在死星外驾着千年猎鹰飞行的时候

translation.en: ...and it was followed by the explosion, that was bullshit!
translation.zh: 它身后在爆炸那真是胡扯！

translation.en: Don't you dare badmouth Star Wars! That was all accurate!
translation.zh: 你怎么敢说《星球大战》的坏话！那都是真实的！

translation.en: I need an MRI.
translation.zh: 我得做一个核磁共振

translation.en: I need an MRI! I've got soft tissue damage.
translation.zh: 我得做一个核磁共振！我软组织损伤

translation.en: No way I don't have soft tissue damage.
translation.zh: 不可能我可没有软组织损伤

translation.en: Please stop.
translation.zh: 请停下来

translation.en: I just wanna go somewhere and breastfeed right now!
translation.zh: 我现在只想去个地方吃奶！

translation.en: Fire Department said it was a gas leak, but no way. That was timed.
translation.zh: 消防局说是瓦斯泄露，但不可能时间是算好的

translation.en: They didn't wanna kill us, they wanted to scare us.
translation.zh: 他们不想杀死我们但是他们想吓住我们

translation.en: Yeah, well, they succeeded, okay?
translation.zh: 是的，嗯，他们成功了，是吗？

translation.en: I'm tired of this. All right?
translation.zh: 我受够了，好吗？

translation.en: I'm tired of explosions and people pointing guns at me.
translation.zh: 我受够了爆炸人们用枪指着我

translation.en: I wanna go back to my desk.
translation.zh: 我想回到办公桌前

translation.en: Guess what? Life gets loud sometimes and messes with your ears.
translation.zh: 猜猜怎么着？生活有时变得很大声并且折磨你的耳朵

translation.en: You can't escape it by hiding at your desk.
translation.zh: 你不能一辈子都在办公桌前躲起来

translation.en: You know what? Yes, you can. I've done it for years, okay?
translation.zh: 你知道吗？是的，你可以我这样做好多年了，是吗？

translation.en: There's no explosions at my desk.
translation.zh: 我的桌子前没有爆炸

translation.en: There's no explosions at my home with my plain wife, in my plain house.
translation.zh: 我和平常的妻子，在我平常的房子里没有爆炸

translation.en: What are you afraid of, man?
translation.zh: 你还怕什么，伙计？

translation.en: I'm your partner. You can tell me. What the hell are you hiding from?
translation.zh: 我是你的搭档，你可以跟我说你究竟在躲避什么？

translation.en: I was a sophomore in college.
translation.zh: 在我大学二年级的时候

translation.en: The university I went to decided they needed to raise tuition.
translation.zh: 我上的学校决定上涨学费

translation.en: A classmate of mine, Brenda, in an effort to raise money and stay in school...
translation.zh: 我的一个同学，布兰达为了赚钱继续上学

translation.en: ...came up with a nifty plan...
translation.zh: 想出了一个绝妙的计划

translation.en: ...where she'd date guys and charge them money.
translation.zh: 她想和男生们约会向他们收费

translation.en: I go on dates all the time...
translation.zh: 我一直和一大群

translation.en: ...with a whole bunch of boys and stuff.
translation.zh: 男生有约会

translation.en: And I need somebody to help me out, like my partner in crime.
translation.zh: 我需要有人把我拯救出来就像，犯罪的搭档一样

translation.en: -Yeah, I could make a schedule. -Yeah, that's what I was thinking.
translation.zh: 是的，我可以做一个时间安排 耶，那正是我所想的

translation.en: -Provide transportation services. -Yeah, yeah.
translation.zh: -提供运输服务-耶，耶

translation.en: -It's gonna be good. -Thanks for asking me.
translation.zh: -这将会是一段美好的时光-非常感谢你邀请我

translation.en: She needed help to make sure the dates went okay...
translation.zh: 她说她需要我的帮助来确定约会顺利进行

translation.en: and that the guys paid her. She said she'd give me a percentage.
translation.zh: 并且男生们付钱给她她说她会给我分红

translation.en: -Oh, my God. You were a pimp. -What? God, no.
translation.zh: -哦，上帝，你是皮条客-什么？上帝啊，不

translation.en: No, I was just trying to help a friend.
translation.zh: 不，我只是试着帮助一个朋友

translation.en: We started making a lot of money.
translation.zh: 我们开始赚很多的钱

translation.en: And wouldn't you know it, some of Brenda's girlfriends...
translation.zh: 当然布兰达的一些女性朋友

translation.en: ...decided they wanted to be a part of it.
translation.zh: 决定她们也想参与进来

translation.en: Soon, there were about 14 ladies I was protecting...
translation.zh: 没多久，我就保护着14位女生

translation.en: ...while they gave me money.
translation.zh: 而她们付钱给我

translation.en: That's called a stable of whores.
translation.zh: 那被称作稳定的妓女

translation.en: We decided I shouldn't use my real name. So we came up with the name "Gator."
translation.zh: 我们决定我不应该使用我的真实姓名于是我们用"盖特"这个名字

translation.en: I'm telling you, you were a pimp.
translation.zh: 我跟你说，你曾是个皮条客

translation.en: No! Are you even listening to the story?
translation.zh: 不！你有没有听这个故事？

translation.en: One day, I wake up and look in the mirror...
translation.zh: 不管怎样，一天我醒来看着镜子里的自己

translation.en: ...and I don't like what I see.
translation.zh: 我不喜欢自己所看到的

translation.en: I mean, I had gotten out of control, and I didn't even realize it.
translation.zh: 我是说，我失控了我甚至都没有意识到

translation.en: You can't have a conscience in the pimp game.
translation.zh: 在皮条客的游戏里你不可能有意识

translation.en: One night, two of my girls, Candy and Jolene, said, "We gotta take you in"...
translation.zh: 一天晚上，我最喜欢的两个女孩 坎迪和乔勒尼，说"我们要你加入进来"

translation.en: ...and they dropped me off at the emergency room.
translation.zh: 她们把我丢在急诊室

translation.en: That's where I met Sheila. I was a mess.
translation.zh: 在那儿我遇见了希拉，我很糟

translation.en: I made a promise to myself and to her that I would never get out of control again.
translation.zh: 我对自己和她发誓我再也不会失控了

translation.en: So as soon as I graduated...
translation.zh: 于是，我一从大学毕业

translation.en: ...I became an accountant for the police department.
translation.zh: 我就进了警察局做会计

translation.en: The most stable job I could think of.
translation.zh: 是我能想到的最稳定的工作

translation.en: An accountant for law and order.
translation.zh: 为法律和秩序而战的会计

translation.en: I just don't wanna ever feel out of control like that ever again.
translation.zh: 我只是再也不想像那次一样失去控制了

translation.en: Don't worry. I got your back.
translation.zh: 别担心，我支持你

translation.en: I say we go get in Ershon's grill, see if he cracks.
translation.zh: 现在我们去厄肖的公司看看他会不会崩溃

translation.en: -I'm tired of all this tippy-toeing around. -Okay.
translation.zh: -我受够了所有这样偷偷摸摸的事情-好吧

translation.en: You can either walk the plank or take your panties off.
translation.zh: 你可以选择走木板要么把裤子脱下来

translation.en: The choice is yours.
translation.zh: 决定权在你

translation.en: -I want to take my panties off. -You've made a wise choice, you have.
translation.zh: -我想脱裤子-你做了明智的选择

translation.en: Mr. Ershon, Detective Gamble and the officer who shot Derek Jeter are here.
translation.zh: 厄肖先生，探员甘布尔和开枪射了德瑞克基特的警官来了

translation.en: Gentlemen, please.
translation.zh: 先生们，请

translation.en: -Remember us, hotshot? -Of course I do. Please, sit.
translation.zh: -记得我们吗，能人？-当然，请坐

translation.en: There she blows.
translation.zh: 她吹了

translation.en: Two of those Russian waters, please. No lime wedges, just cucumber.
translation.zh: 请上两杯俄国水不要加酸橙楔，只加黄瓜

translation.en: Guess where we just came from? An explosion at your accounting office.
translation.zh: 猜猜我们刚从哪里来？你的会计公司发生爆炸了

translation.en: Yes, that awful gas leak.
translation.zh: 是的，可怕的煤气泄露

translation.en: Gas leak? The only gas leak is the one coming out of your mouth right now.
translation.zh: 煤气泄露？唯一的煤气泄露就是现在从你的嘴里出来的

translation.en: I just thank God no one was hurt or injured in a bad way.
translation.zh: 我只想感谢上帝没人受伤

translation.en: I absolutely abhor death.
translation.zh: 我非常憎恶死亡

translation.en: Hey, Andrew Lloyd Webber. The jig is up, okay?
translation.zh: 我非常憎恶死亡 嘿，安德鲁洛伊德韦伯吉格舞结束了，好吗？

translation.en: We know that wasn't your security team that grabbed you.
translation.zh: 我们知道抓你的不是你的保安小组

translation.en: And we know you're targeting a big fish to cover losses.
translation.zh: 我们还知道你看中一条大鱼来弥补你的损失

translation.en: You talk or I beat you so it don't show no bruises.
translation.zh: 你自己来说还是让我打你这样不会显出有淤痕

translation.en: God, this water is good. Terry, have you tried the water?
translation.zh: 你自己来说还是让我打你这样不会显出有淤痕 上帝啊，这水太棒了特里，你喝过这水了吗？

translation.en: Shut up, Allen.
translation.zh: 闭嘴，艾伦

translation.en: I assure you, I have no idea what you're talking about.
translation.zh: 我向你保证我不知道你在说什么

translation.en: I understand there was a bit of a mix-up with the whole scaffolding business.
translation.zh: 我明白在这个脚手架的事情上有点混乱

translation.en: The cucumber accents the water in such a way that....
translation.zh: 黄瓜突出了水的味道以至于...

translation.en: Perhaps by way of apology, I can offer you my personal courtside seats...
translation.zh: 为表示歉意我可以给你们我个人的

translation.en: ...for the Knicks game, with access to the Ambassador Club.
translation.zh: 尼克斯队球赛的内场球票附带大使俱乐部的入场

translation.en: Come on, Knicks! Come on! I got Knicks' fever and it's catching!
translation.zh: 麦迪逊广场花园 加油，尼克斯队！加油！我为尼克斯狂并且现在发狂了！

translation.en: Hey. This feels weird sitting here. It feels like it's a bribe.
translation.zh: 嘿，坐在这儿感觉很奇怪感觉这是贿赂

translation.en: It is a bribe. Son-of-a-bitch, I saw courtside and I went blind.
translation.zh: 这是贿赂，狗娘养的我看到内场就全然不顾了

translation.en: Come on.
translation.zh: 拜托

translation.en: Call me!
translation.zh: 打给我！

translation.en: -Excuse me. -That was a trick.
translation.zh: -打扰-那是个小把戏

translation.en: No more.
translation.zh: 别来这套了

translation.en: Gentlemen, you have a choice: Mamma Mia or Jersey Boys.
translation.zh: 先生们，你们可以选择《妈妈咪呀》还是《泽西男孩》

translation.en: Fantastic! You're so unbelievable!
translation.zh: 棒极了！你简直令人难以置信！

translation.en: Damn it. He did it again.
translation.zh: 妈的，他又来了

translation.en: -Excuse me. -No more tickets.
translation.zh: -打扰-别再拿票出来了

translation.en: Mr. Ershon, I tried to keep them in the waiting room.
translation.zh: 厄肖先生我尽量把他们留在会客室

translation.en: That's okay, Susan. Two Glacier waters with Mediterranean limes.
translation.zh: 好的，苏珊两杯冰水，加地中海酸橙

translation.en: No, no, no. No more water. We're not here for that.
translation.zh: 不，不，不，别再上水了我们不是来喝水的

translation.en: No, I was very much looking forward to having a water.
translation.zh: 不，我很想喝杯水

translation.en: -How great is Jersey Boys? -It's not great. It's fantastic!
translation.zh: -《泽西男孩》怎么样？-不是怎么样，是棒极了！

translation.en: You totally undersold it. The pageantry, the costumes.
translation.zh: 你完全贬低了它华丽壮观，那服装

translation.en: Wow, what a musical.
translation.zh: 哇哦，多么棒的音乐

translation.en: Hey. Get over here.
translation.zh: 嗨，过来

translation.en: -What's wrong with you? -What?
translation.zh: -你有什么问题？-什么？

translation.en: That's not what we're here for.
translation.zh: 我们来这不是为了那个

translation.en: We're gonna do good cop, bad cop. Okay?
translation.zh: 我们做好警察、坏警察游戏，好吗？

translation.en: It's the oldest game in the book for a reason. It works.
translation.zh: 这成为书上最古老的游戏是有原因的它奏效

translation.en: I come strong, then you come in.
translation.zh: 我来势汹汹，然后你进来

translation.en: -You got it? -Yeah.
translation.zh: -你明白吗？-是的

translation.en: -I come strong, then you come in. -Right. Got it.
translation.zh: -我来势汹汹，然后你进来-好吧，明白了

translation.en: Now you listen to me, you piece of shit.
translation.zh: 现在你听我说，你这坨狗屎

translation.en: It's just you and me, and I'm gonna rip you apart!
translation.zh: 只有你和我我要撕烂你！

translation.en: How did you cover your losses up? What drug cartel are you working with?
translation.zh: 你是怎么样掩盖损失的？你现在和哪个毒品集团交易？

translation.en: -Okay, I'll talk to you, you're reasonable! -No, no, look at me!
translation.zh: -好吧，我和你谈谈，你很理性！-不，不，看着我！

translation.en: You wanna talk to me? You wanna talk to me?
translation.zh: 你想和我谈谈？你想和我谈谈？

translation.en: Allen, what are you doing? What are you doing? Allen!
translation.zh: 艾伦，你在做什么？你在做什么？艾伦！

translation.en: I'm gonna make you eat a plate of human shit!
translation.zh: 我要让你吃下整盘的大便！

translation.en: Get away from me!
translation.zh: 离我远点！

translation.en: Where is he?
translation.zh: 他去哪了？

translation.en: Look, I'm really sorry about that.
translation.zh: 瞧，对此我真的是非常抱歉

translation.en: I saw how aggressive you were being, and I thought:
translation.zh: 我看到你是多么地咄咄逼人我想

translation.en: "Wow, I gotta go even bigger than that, since we're doing bad cop, bad cop."
translation.zh: "哇哦，我要比那做得更好因为我们是坏警察，坏警察"

translation.en: What? No, I said, "Good cop, bad cop." I'm the bad cop, you're the good cop.
translation.zh: 什么？不，我说，"好警察，坏警察"我是坏警察，你是好警察

translation.en: Okay, then there it is. That's it. I thought you said, "Bad cop, bad cop."
translation.zh: 好吧，就是这样，就这样我以为你说，"坏警察，坏警察"

translation.en: Well, while you were going crazy, look what I snagged from his desk.
translation.zh: 看，在你发飙的时候我从他桌上搞来了什么

translation.en: -Think it's his phone sheet. -Nice.
translation.zh: -我觉得是他的电话簿-好极了

translation.en: Seven calls to the lottery office.
translation.zh: 给彩票中心打了七通电话

translation.en: That could be the evidence we need for Mauch.
translation.zh: 那会是我们要给毛奇找的证据

translation.en: -Get back. Colombian drug lords. -Where are you getting that from?
translation.zh: -回来，哥伦比亚毒枭-你从哪弄到那东西的？

translation.en: Jesus!
translation.zh: 上帝啊！

translation.en: Can you imagine where you'd be in your career if you hadn't shot Jeter?
translation.zh: 你能想象如果不是因为朝基特开了枪你现在事业会发展得怎样呢？

translation.en: -We call this in, right? -We got all the evidence we need.
translation.zh: -我们把这个算进来，是吧？-好像我们已经有了所需要的所有证据

translation.en: I'm sorry, my butterfly.
translation.zh: 对不起了，我的蝴蝶

translation.en: We'll load them up, send them back to go.
translation.zh: 我们把他们弄上车，然后送走

translation.en: -Holy shit. -What?
translation.zh: -狗屎-怎么了？

translation.en: What do you mean, what? Where are we?
translation.zh: 你什么意思，什么？我们在哪儿？

translation.en: We're in the high desert.
translation.zh: 我们在荒漠里

translation.en: They took my shoes again, man! What the hell is it with taking shoes?
translation.zh: 他们又拿走了我们的鞋子，伙计！拿走鞋到底要干什么？

translation.en: -They took your wooden gun? -Yeah.
translation.zh: -他们拿走了你的木头手枪？-是的

translation.en: -Hello? -Hello, Gene? I mean, captain.
translation.zh: -哈罗？-哈罗，基因？我是说，警长

translation.en: Captain, it's Allen Gamble.
translation.zh: 警长，我是艾伦甘布尔

translation.en: Yeah, yeah. Where are you? What's going on?
translation.zh: 是，是，你们在哪里？发生什么事了？

translation.en: Captain, it's a long story, but I'm just gonna cut to the chase.
translation.zh: 警长，说来话长，但是我要说重点了

translation.en: We are in Las Vegas, all right?
translation.zh: 我们在拉斯维加斯，好吧？

translation.en: We were kidnapped, put on a freight train, and shipped out here.
translation.zh: 我们被绑架了，扔到了运货列车上来到了这个地方

translation.en: Let me just stop you right there. Don't bullshit me.
translation.zh: 我打住你们一下别跟我鬼扯

translation.en: Captain, I am being straight with you.
translation.zh: 警长，我跟你直说

translation.en: Look, we think something's going on, okay?
translation.zh: 瞧，我们认为会有事情发生，好吗？

translation.en: We think Ershon is targeting the lottery to cover his losses.
translation.zh: 我们认为厄肖的目标是用彩票掩盖他的损失

translation.en: Wait. How many times did I explicitly say to you, "Lay off Ershon"?
translation.zh: 等等，我跟你们明确地说过多少次了"别去碰厄肖"？

translation.en: Terry, Captain wants to know...
translation.zh: 特里，警长想知道

translation.en: ...how many times has he asked us to lay off Ershon.
translation.zh: 他跟我们说过多少次要别去碰厄肖

translation.en: Twice.
translation.zh: 两次

translation.en: Twice. Terry says twice. I agree.
translation.zh: 两次，特里说两次，我同意

translation.en: I'm hanging up. I'm done.
translation.zh: 我要挂了，我说完了

translation.en: I gotta tell you, I started getting a hand for that, a taste for that Pai Gow.
translation.zh: 我告诉你，我已经动手了，玩牌九的风格

translation.en: Martin and Fosse, super cops, in three, two....
translation.zh: 马丁和福斯，超级警察三，二...

translation.en: So we busted that junkie. Got back 74 thou in diamonds. Seventy-four thou.
translation.zh: 于是，我们搜查了那个瘾君子追回了价值74,000美元的钻石，7万4

translation.en: Solved the Castien case.
translation.zh: 侦破了加斯第安劫案

translation.en: Seventy-four thousand dollars? That's all they took?
translation.zh: 74,000美元？那是他们抢走的全部？

translation.en: There's millions of dollars of diamonds in that place.
translation.zh: 那地方有几千万美元的钻石

translation.en: How about this, Gamble? How about you shut your face?
translation.zh: 这个怎么样，甘布尔？把你嘴闭上如何？

translation.en: All right? Just shut it.
translation.zh: 好吧？那就闭上

translation.en: Hoitz, Gamble, captain's looking for you.
translation.zh: 霍伊茨，甘布尔，警长找你们

translation.en: I know it's off the subject, but is Kevlar copyrighted?
translation.zh: 我知道有点跑题但复制纤维B有版权吗？

translation.en: -Captain? -Yeah.
translation.zh: -警长？-是的

translation.en: -Is it a bad time? -No, come on. Come on.
translation.zh: -时候不对？-不，继续，继续

translation.en: -Not me, right? -Yeah, and you.
translation.zh: -不是我，是吗？-是的，还有你

translation.en: Fellows, I'm sure you're familiar with the venerable DA Radford.
translation.zh: 伙计们，我相信你们熟悉令人敬重的地方法院检查官莱德福特

translation.en: -He wanted to come and pay us a visit. -Hello, gentlemen.
translation.zh: 他想过来和我们见一面 嗨，先生们

translation.en: -Hello, sir. -Hey.
translation.zh: -嗨，长官-嗨

translation.en: -You know, I was talking to Gene here. -He prefers "captain."
translation.zh: -你知道，我正和基因说话-他更喜欢"警长"

translation.en: Yes, I was talking to Gene here, and, you know, it's funny.
translation.zh: 是的，我正和基因讲话并且，你知道，这很有趣

translation.en: I don't know what you two have been up to...
translation.zh: 我不知道你们两个在调查什么

translation.en: ...but I've been getting calls from people I don't ever get calls from.
translation.zh: 但是我接到了一些电话从一些根本不会给我打电话的人们

translation.en: In 40 years of enforcing the law, I've learned one thing.
translation.zh: 在40年的执法过程中我学到一件事

translation.en: When that happens, stop.
translation.zh: 当那发生时，停下

translation.en: -Gene, how's the family? -Good, good, Louis, thanks for asking.
translation.zh: -基因，你的家人怎么样？-很好，很好，路易斯，谢谢您的问候

translation.en: -My son's bisexual, so.... -Tremendous.
translation.zh: -我的儿子是双性恋，所以...-好极了

translation.en: Gentlemen, do we understand each other?
translation.zh: 先生们，你们明白吗？

translation.en: -Cut the crap! -Will do.
translation.zh: -别干蠢事-会的

translation.en: Guy never comes down here.
translation.zh: 那家伙从不下楼来这儿

translation.en: Twenty years, I think I've seen that guy in this building one time.
translation.zh: 二十年来，我想我在这桩大楼里只看见那家伙一次

translation.en: -He's a heavyweight cat, that guy. -He was sitting right here.
translation.zh: -他是只胖猫，那个家伙-他就坐在那里

translation.en: Yeah. I think you missed the point. Anyway, look.
translation.zh: 是的，我想你跑题了管他呢，瞧

translation.en: Blue and white found your firearms down by the Hudson River. Here you go, Terry.
translation.zh: 巡警在哈德逊河下游找到了你的枪给你，特里

translation.en: You know what?
translation.zh: 你知道吗？

translation.en: I'm gonna hang on to the wooden gun.
translation.zh: 我要收回那把木头枪

translation.en: -To give me back my real gun? -No.
translation.zh: -把我的真枪还给我？-不

translation.en: Because I'm gonna give you this.
translation.zh: 因为我要给你这个

translation.en: It's a rape whistle. You blow that if you run into any trouble...
translation.zh: 是一个紧急哨如果你遇到了麻烦你就吹哨

translation.en: ...and someone with an actual gun will come and help you out.
translation.zh: 佩戴真枪的人就会来帮助你

translation.en: We were abducted, captain! This shit is real! Ershon's dirty. He's targeting the lottery!
translation.zh: 我们被绑架了，警长！这是真的！厄肖有犯罪，他的目标是彩票！

translation.en: Next, I want you guys to hand in all the evidence you think you have to the SEC.
translation.zh: 下一步，我想要你们把你们认为所有是证据的东西交给证券交易委员会

translation.en: The financial district's under their jurisdiction.
translation.zh: 金融事件是他们的管辖范围

translation.en: Don't you get it? This case is talking to us!
translation.zh: 难道你不明白吗？这个案件属于我们！

translation.en: I'm a peacock, captain! You gotta let me fly on this one!
translation.zh: 我是一只孔雀，警长！这次你要让我飞起来！

translation.en: You know what, Terry? Let's just settle this. Peacocks don't fly.
translation.zh: 你知道吗，特里？我们把这个讲清楚孔雀不会飞

translation.en: -They fly, they fly a little bit. -Yeah, about as much as a penguin.
translation.zh: -它们会飞，会飞一点-是的，就像企鹅那样

translation.en: One more thing, do me a favor, don't go chasing waterfalls.
translation.zh: -它们会飞，会飞一点-是的，就像企鹅那样 还有一件事，帮我一个忙不要去追逐瀑布

translation.en: Was that accidental, or were you trying to quote TLC on purpose?
translation.zh: 那是意外，还是你有意引用TLC的歌词？

translation.en: I don't even understand the reference.
translation.zh: 我甚至不知道那个出处

translation.en: -You don't understand what you said? -I don't know what that is.
translation.zh: -你不明白你说的是什么？-我不知道那是什么

translation.en: Get out. Go.
translation.zh: 出去，出去

translation.en: How did they get that story?
translation.zh: 他们是怎么知道那个故事的？

translation.en: I'm tired of being treated like a jerk for trying to do the right thing.
translation.zh: 我厌倦了尝试去做正确的事情却被像傻瓜一样对待

translation.en: Hey, guys.
translation.zh: 嘿，伙计们

translation.en: There's a proxy vote for a big reinvestment of the pension coming up...
translation.zh: 这有一个为养老金再投资发起的代理投票活动

translation.en: -...so if you just wanna come by the old.... -Damn it, Bob!
translation.zh: -所以如果你们刚好想拜访老...-妈的，鲍勃！

translation.en: Let me ask you something.
translation.zh: 让我问你些事情

translation.en: What do you even do around here besides interrupt people?
translation.zh: 除了在这儿打扰别人你还会做什么？

translation.en: Well, I serve as treasurer to the union.
translation.zh: 嗯，我是工会的出纳

translation.en: I make a wicked pot of decaf.
translation.zh: 我做一大壶脱咖啡因咖啡

translation.en: Exactly! You're a worthless piece of shit!
translation.zh: 完全正确！你是个完全没用的狗屎！

translation.en: Probably right, Terry. That's why I feel so sad all the time.
translation.zh: 可能是吧，特里那正是我一直感觉很糟的原因

translation.en: I'm gonna go for a walk.
translation.zh: 我要出去走走

translation.en: -Bob! -Say something.
translation.zh: -鲍勃！-讲点什么

translation.en: Come on! Bob!
translation.zh: 来吧！鲍勃！

translation.en: I didn't mean it, all right? I'm upset.
translation.zh: 我不是存心的，好吗？我很郁闷

translation.en: These braised short ribs taste like a dog's asshole.
translation.zh: 这些炖的小排骨吃起来就像是狗屁股一样

translation.en: -Sweetie. -You know what? I'm sitting here thinking:
translation.zh: -宝贝-你知道吗，我坐在这儿想

translation.en: "Who in the world would slow roast a dog's asshole...
translation.zh: "世上谁会去慢烤狗屁股

translation.en: ...and serve it to their husband?"
translation.zh: 然后给她们的丈夫吃呢？"

translation.en: -You would. -You are being awful. What's wrong?
translation.zh: -你会-你很差劲，出什么事了？

translation.en: -Captain took us off the case. -I'm sorry.
translation.zh: -警长不让我们办案了-我很抱歉

translation.en: I told Terry about my dark days in college, and it brought up some feelings.
translation.zh: 我把大学时的黑暗日子讲给特里听这唤起了一些感觉

translation.en: Well, honeydick, that was a long time ago. You're not that same person you were.
translation.zh: 嗯，宝贝，那是很久以前了你不再是同一个人了

translation.en: No, you don't get it. There is a darkness inside of me.
translation.zh: 不，你不明白我有阴暗的内在

translation.en: It wants to get out. It wants to walk around.
translation.zh: 它想出来它想走出来

translation.en: It wants some walking around money, and it wants to buy some shoes.
translation.zh: 它想在金钱周围转转它想买些鞋

translation.en: And it wants to walk up with the people and say, "Hey, Gator don't play no shit."
translation.zh: 它想走到人家面前说"嘿，盖特别做那蠢事"

translation.en: -You feel me? -Yeah.
translation.zh: -你感觉得到吗？-是的

translation.en: Gator never been about that, never been about playing no shit.
translation.zh: 盖特从来不那样从来不会做蠢事

translation.en: -Sweetie, I'm sorry. -It's okay.
translation.zh: -宝贝，我很抱歉-没事的

translation.en: -I just.... -Remember that night we met?
translation.zh: -我只是...-记得我们相识的那晚吗？

translation.en: The attending physician told me, "We got a drugged-out pimp in the back."
translation.zh: 参加救治的医生告诉我说"后面有一个嗑药到快死了的皮条客"

translation.en: And I went back there, and I pulled open that curtain...
translation.zh: 于是我来到那儿拉开帘布

translation.en: ...and I saw you.
translation.zh: 我看见了你

translation.en: You were weak, scared...
translation.zh: 你很虚弱，被吓坏了

translation.en: ...ass up, inflamed, crying.
translation.zh: 屁股朝上，发炎了，在哭

translation.en: At that moment, I knew. "Hey, he's no pimp. Pimps don't cry."
translation.zh: 那一刻，我知道"嘿，他不是皮条客，皮条客不会哭"

translation.en: Pimps don't cry
translation.zh: 皮条客不会哭

translation.en: Pimps don't cry
translation.zh: 皮条客不会哭

translation.en: No, they don't
translation.zh: 不，他们不会

translation.en: They don't shed a tear
translation.zh: 他们不会流一滴眼泪

translation.en: Pimps don't cry
translation.zh: 皮条客不会哭

translation.en: They never shed a tear
translation.zh: 他们从不流一滴眼泪

translation.en: Come lay with me. Be safe, and let's make love. Come on.
translation.zh: 和我一起躺下安全地，我们来做爱，来吧

translation.en: Every time you say, "Be safe," it tears me apart.
translation.zh: 每次你说，"安全地"那都会把我撕开

translation.en: You gotta let me be who I'm gonna be.
translation.zh: 你让我变成我要成为的人

translation.en: Allen, I'm pregnant.
translation.zh: 艾伦，我怀孕了

translation.en: Whose baby is that?
translation.zh: 是谁的孩子？

translation.en: Who's the man who did that to you? Gator's bitches better be using jimmies!
translation.zh: 是谁对你做了那种事情？盖特的婊子最好使用保险套！

translation.en: I'm sorry. See, that's what I'm talking about.
translation.zh: 很抱歉，看，那就是我要说的

translation.en: Oh, my God.
translation.zh: 哦，上帝啊

translation.en: You need to leave.
translation.zh: 你得离开了

translation.en: Get out! Get out, Allen! Get out!
translation.zh: 出去！出去，艾伦！出去！

translation.en: Hey.
translation.zh: 嘿

translation.en: Hey. What are you doing here?
translation.zh: 嘿，你在这儿做什么？

translation.en: Come here when I have lady troubles, which means I come here every night.
translation.zh: 当我碰到有关女人问题的时候就来这儿就是说我每晚都来

translation.en: What are you doing here?
translation.zh: 你在这儿做什么？

translation.en: Sheila and I got into it tonight.
translation.zh: 今晚我和希拉之间出现了问题

translation.en: She threw me out.
translation.zh: 她把我赶出来了

translation.en: Well, you're not a cop till your wife throws you out of the house, partner.
translation.zh: 嗯，直到你老婆把你赶出家门你才是一个警察，搭档

translation.en: Does it bother you that the Castien robbers only took 74 grand in diamonds?
translation.zh: 加斯第安劫案中劫匪只抢劫了74,000美元的钻石，这有没有让你觉得困惑？

translation.en: They're junkies. Who cares? I mean....
translation.zh: 他们是瘾君子，谁在乎？我是说...

translation.en: I don't know if a junkie can go down a 20-story zip line, though.
translation.zh: 我不认为一个瘾君子可以从20层高的楼上滑锁下来

translation.en: How you fellas doing?
translation.zh: 伙计们怎么样？

translation.en: We're about to have us a little screw party in this red Prius over here...
translation.zh: 我们要在这部红色普锐斯车里来次狂欢

translation.en: ...if you wanna join us.
translation.zh: 如果你愿意加入我们的话

translation.en: Hey, are you Dirty Mike and the boys?
translation.zh: 嘿，你是肮脏迈克和男孩们？

translation.en: -How do you know who we are? -You left a note in that car.
translation.zh: -你怎么知道我们是谁？-你在车里给我留了字条

translation.en: -Police, shithead. -He's a copper. We gotta go. Come on!
translation.zh: -警察，狗屎-他是个条子，我们快跑，快！

translation.en: Hey! Goose it, boys! They're cops!
translation.zh: 嘿！加油，伙伴们！他们是条子！

translation.en: You turned my beautiful Prius into a nightmare!
translation.zh: 你们把我漂亮的普锐斯变成了噩梦！

translation.en: We are gonna have sex in your car! It will happen again!
translation.zh: 我们要在你的车子里做爱！还会再发生的！

translation.en: I don't know where I'm gonna sleep tonight.
translation.zh: 我不知道今晚要在哪儿过夜1

translation.en: Fortunately, I know where you're gonna be drinking.
translation.zh: 还好，我知道你会在哪喝酒

translation.en: Jack of All Trades. Drinks on me. Come on.
translation.zh: 杰克所有的酒，我请客，来吧

translation.en: -No, I already have a beer. -No, no, no, no.
translation.zh: -不，我已经喝过一瓶啤酒了-不，不，不，不

translation.en: I'm talking about doing some serious drinking.
translation.zh: 我是说认认真真地喝酒

translation.en: Drinking with Terry Hoitz.
translation.zh: 和特里霍伊茨喝酒

translation.en: This sucks, man. Work our ass off on this case...
translation.zh: 这太烂了，伙计把我们踢出这个案子

translation.en: ...now we gotta hand over all of our evidence?
translation.zh: 现在我们要交出所有的证据？

translation.en: Yeah, it's not right.
translation.zh: 是的，这不对

translation.en: Oh, my God, I'm hungover.
translation.zh: 哦，上帝啊，我好难受啊

translation.en: So you guys are law enforcement?
translation.zh: 那么，你们是警察？

translation.en: Yeah, we're an independent government agency who...
translation.zh: 是的，我们是独立的政府人员

translation.en: ...along with the FBI and the Federal Reserve...
translation.zh: 跟联邦调查局和联储一样

translation.en: ...regulate the stock market and corporate fraud.
translation.zh: 管理股票市场和企业欺诈行为

translation.en: And the Federal Reserve is a prison?
translation.zh: 联储是个监狱？

translation.en: No, basically, it's a held-for-profit bank that sets interest rates...
translation.zh: 不，基本上，它是一家私有银行它设定利率

translation.en: ...and loans money to other banks.
translation.zh: 借钱给其他银行

translation.en: -Is that a wastebasket? -Yeah, right there.
translation.zh: -那是垃圾桶吗？-是的，就在那边

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: -You all right? -Holy hell!
translation.zh: -你还好吗？-天啊！

translation.en: I'm so sorry.
translation.zh: 很抱歉

translation.en: I got so drunk last night.
translation.zh: 我昨晚喝得烂醉

translation.en: I think I thought a tube of toothpaste was astronaut food.
translation.zh: 我想我把一支牙膏当作是太空食品

translation.en: Come on in, fellas.
translation.zh: 进来，伙计们

translation.en: You gotta be kidding me. You're Ershon's lawyer.
translation.zh: 你一定是在开玩笑你是厄肖的律师

translation.en: We're turning over our investigation to you?
translation.zh: 我们要把调查转交给你？

translation.en: Let me assure you there will be no conflict of interest...
translation.zh: 我向你们保证我和戴维厄肖之间

translation.en: ...between me and David Ershon.
translation.zh: 没有利益冲突

translation.en: And if this were an actual investigation, I would immediately recuse myself.
translation.zh: 如果这真的是一项调查我会立即自保

translation.en: This is all the evidence we have, and I truly hope you take this seriously.
translation.zh: 这是我们所有的证据我真诚地希望你认真对待

translation.en: Yes. Very much so.
translation.zh: 是的，一定会

translation.en: From everything I've heard, I understand...
translation.zh: 据我听到的一切，我明白

translation.en: ...you guys are the best at these types of investigations.
translation.zh: 你们是这方面调查的翘楚

translation.en: Outside of Enron and AIG...
translation.zh: 除了安然，美国国际集团

translation.en: ...and Bernie Madoff...
translation.zh: 和伯纳德麦道夫之外

translation.en: ...WorldCom, Bear Stearns, Lehman Brothers.
translation.zh: 还有世界通，贝尔斯登，雷曼兄弟

translation.en: Okay. Thank you. Thank you, detective.
translation.zh: 好吧，谢谢你，谢谢你，警探

translation.en: -Would you like a seat, or you're fine? -No, I'm good.
translation.zh: -你需要把椅子，你还好吗？-不，我很好

translation.en: Okay. Let me just assure you fellas...
translation.zh: 好的，我向你们保证

translation.en: ...David Ershon is an upstanding citizen.
translation.zh: 戴维厄肖是一位杰出的公民

translation.en: I am playing squash with him tonight at the club...
translation.zh: 我今晚要在俱乐部和他打壁球

translation.en: ...and we're having dinner.
translation.zh: 还会一起用餐

translation.en: You listen to me, you Windsor knot-wearing monkey...
translation.zh: 你听我说你这个打着温莎领结的猴子

translation.en: ...you play squash with Ershon, right?
translation.zh: 你和厄肖打壁球，是吗？

translation.en: Your kids go to school with his? How would you know if he's clean or not?
translation.zh: 你的孩子和他的孩子一起上学？你怎么会知道他是否清白？

translation.en: I will take a look at your evidence...
translation.zh: 我会查看你们的证据

translation.en: ...and I will take a second look at the financials.
translation.zh: 我还会再次查看财务情况

translation.en: And when I come back and bust your ass...
translation.zh: 当我回来的时候我会打碎你的屁股

translation.en: ...we're locking David Ershon in the Federal Reserve!
translation.zh: 我们把戴维厄肖投进联储！

translation.en: He still doesn't understand the concept.
translation.zh: 他还是没有弄清概念

translation.en: What are you doing?
translation.zh: 你在干什么？

translation.en: We just handed all of our evidence over to the bad guy's lawyer!
translation.zh: 我们刚把所有的证据交给了那个混蛋的律师！

translation.en: Are you a big man, huh?
translation.zh: 你是个大人物，哈？

translation.en: -I'm talking to you. -What?
translation.zh: -我在跟你说话-什么？

translation.en: You wake up in the morning, you say, "I'm putting on my big boy pants"?
translation.zh: 你早上醒来，说"我正往身上穿我大男孩的裤子"？

translation.en: "Look, I'm wearing a belt!
translation.zh: "看，我打着领带！

translation.en: "I've got big boy pants on!"
translation.zh: 我把大男孩的裤子穿上了！"

translation.en: -Stop! -We don't, we don't do this!
translation.zh: -别说了！-我们不，我们不做这个！

translation.en: You're scaring the shit out of me, man! Stop it!
translation.zh: 你把我的屎都吓出来了，伙计！别说了！

translation.en: Is this how you conduct yourself? In a democracy?
translation.zh: 这就是你们的行为吗？在一个民主的国家？

translation.en: What the hell are you doing, man?
translation.zh: 你到底在做什么，伙计？

translation.en: I'm so tired of you getting angry and yelling all the time.
translation.zh: 我已经受够了你一直发火大声嚷嚷

translation.en: It's exhausting.
translation.zh: 太累人了

translation.en: I feel like I'm partners with the Hulk.
translation.zh: 我觉得自己就是绿巨人的搭档

translation.en: You wanna know why I'm so angry all the time?
translation.zh: 你想知道我为什么一直这么生气？

translation.en: Because the more I try and do right, the more I screw things up.
translation.zh: 因为我越是努力做正确的事情我就会把事情搞得越糟

translation.en: We've got a possible jumper at 3 World Financial Center, 23rd floor.
translation.zh: 在世界金融中心三号楼，23层可能有人要跳楼

translation.en: All units, fire department, en route.
translation.zh: 各部门请注意，消防部门，出动

translation.en: -SEC. -Beaman's office.
translation.zh: -证券交易委员会-比曼的办公室

translation.en: We have to go.
translation.zh: 我们得去

translation.en: -But the captain. -We have to go, Allen.
translation.zh: -但是警长-我们得去，艾伦

translation.en: All units, I need a respondent. Possible jumper, 3 World Financial Center.
translation.zh: 各部门请注意，我需要现场增援可能有人跳楼，世界金融中心三号楼

translation.en: Shit. It's Beaman!
translation.zh: 妈的，是比曼！

translation.en: -He's gotta know something. -Wesley!
translation.zh: -他肯定知道些什么-韦斯利！

translation.en: Detective Hoitz and Gamble. We got this.
translation.zh: 警探霍伊茨和甘布尔，我们来处理

translation.en: I took an online class at University of Phoenix on negotiating.
translation.zh: 我在菲尼克斯大学上过关于谈判的在线课程

translation.en: I'm gonna need a priest and a bullhorn.
translation.zh: 我需要一位牧师和一支手提扩音器

translation.en: -I got no bullhorn. -Does anyone have a bullhorn?
translation.zh: -我没有手提扩音器-有人有手提扩音器吗？

translation.en: -Bullhorn, anyone? -Truck.
translation.zh: -手提扩音器，有人有吗？-卡车

translation.en: Police business. I need to use your PA system.
translation.zh: 警察办案我要征用你的有线广播系统

translation.en: Okay, let me turn it on.
translation.zh: 好吧，我把它打开

translation.en: Mr. Beaman? Mr. Don Beaman?
translation.zh: 比曼先生？比曼先生？

translation.en: It's Wesley. I know Ershon's Wesley's....
translation.zh: 我是韦斯利，我认识厄肖的韦斯利的...

translation.en: Look, there's a lot to live for in this life.
translation.zh: 看，生命里有许多值得为之活下去的东西

translation.en: A lot of great things, like soda pop, big fresh can of soda pop.
translation.zh: 很多美妙的东西，像苏打水，大罐的苏打水

translation.en: They do not care!
translation.zh: 他们不在乎！

translation.en: Give me this. I know how to talk to him.
translation.zh: 把这个给我，我知道怎么跟他谈

translation.en: Listen, we all know you're a scumbag, and nobody cares about you.
translation.zh: 听着，我们都知道你是个卑鄙的家伙没有人关心你

translation.en: Rotten piece of shit.
translation.zh: 烂掉的狗屎

translation.en: That's worse than what I was saying.
translation.zh: 比我说得更糟

translation.en: I'm not gonna lie to you, Don.
translation.zh: 我不会对你撒谎，道恩

translation.en: People down here are starting to murmur that you don't have the balls to do it.
translation.zh: 下面的人开始在嘀咕说你没有胆量跳

translation.en: -I don't care! -Yeah.
translation.zh: -我不在乎！-是的

translation.en: I say you can do it.
translation.zh: 我说你能做到

translation.en: I mean, I don't want you to jump. I'm just saying you have the capability.
translation.zh: 我是说，我不是想你跳下去我只是说你有这个能力

translation.en: Look, he's flying!
translation.zh: 瞧，他在飞！

translation.en: Stop that.
translation.zh: 别说了

translation.en: Half empty bottle of gin. Chair knocked over.
translation.zh: 半瓶杜松子酒，椅子被撞倒了

translation.en: Look at this, it's a clear sign of a struggle. Make sure you get this, all right?
translation.zh: 看这个，有明显的打斗的痕迹确保你记下这些了，好吗？

translation.en: Detectives, all your work's done here. You can go.
translation.zh: 警探，你在这儿所有的工作都完成了你可以走了

translation.en: What about Ershon targeting the lottery?
translation.zh: 那厄肖要对彩票下手怎么办？

translation.en: You know why Ershon was calling down to the lottery offices all those times?
translation.zh: 你知道为什么那段日子里厄肖会一直打电话给彩票中心吗？

translation.en: Because he was hooking up with the Powerball girl...
translation.zh: 因为他搭上了能量球女孩

translation.en: ...the one on TV with all the numbered balls.
translation.zh: 就是电视里那个出现在号码球边的那个

translation.en: Yeah. She filed a restraining order on him last week.
translation.zh: 是的，上个星期她对他提起了限制令

translation.en: It was right there in front of you the whole time.
translation.zh: 这很明显

translation.en: -Can't be. -You guys are getting transferred.
translation.zh: -不可能-你们被调离了

translation.en: -What? -Traffic.
translation.zh: -什么？-交通部

translation.en: Yeah, that's right.
translation.zh: 是的，是这样的

translation.en: You, you're gonna walk a beat downtown. You're gonna walk a beat downtown.
translation.zh: 你，你要徒步去商业区你要徒步去商业区

translation.en: -It's done. No, no. It's done. -Captain, what are you talking about?
translation.zh: -结束了，不，不，结束了-警长，你在说什么？

translation.en: -Save yourselves some gas. -Captain!
translation.zh: -给你们自己省点油-警长！

translation.en: Is there an appeal process we can...?
translation.zh: 有上诉流程可以让我们...

translation.en: Had to do what you had to do, captain.
translation.zh: 去做你应该要做的事情，警长 哇！那很痛

translation.en: That hurt.
translation.zh: 哇！那很痛

translation.en: -Excuse me. Where's my car? -They towed it.
translation.zh: -打扰下，我的车哪儿去了？-他们把它拖走了

translation.en: Couple of homeless people were messing around in it.
translation.zh: 一些无家可归的人在里面乱来

translation.en: -That's an official police car. -Could have fooled me.
translation.zh: -那是一部官方的警车-差点把我也骗了

translation.en: Wow, Mauch was upset, huh?
translation.zh: 哇哦，毛奇很不安，哈？

translation.en: Really?
translation.zh: 真的吗？

translation.en: The only thing I had to be proud of in my life was being a detective.
translation.zh: 我生活中唯一值得骄傲的地方在于我是一名警探

translation.en: That was all I had. Now it's gone.
translation.zh: 那是我所拥有的全部，现在都没了

translation.en: I know. I know. You still got me.
translation.zh: 我明白，我明白，你还有我

translation.en: Don't you get it? I don't want you, Allen, okay? I never did.
translation.zh: 难道你不明白吗？我不想要你，艾伦，好吗？我从没想过

translation.en: I told you that scaffolding violation was dogshit.
translation.zh: 我告诉你那个脚手架违章就是狗屎

translation.en: I can't believe you still doubt me after everything we've seen.
translation.zh: 我不能相信在我们鉴证了所有这一切之后你仍然怀疑我

translation.en: It's a real case, and I'm a real cop. We just got the wrong target for Ershon.
translation.zh: 这是个真正的案子，我是一名真正的警察我们只是找错了厄肖的目标

translation.en: -You carry a rape whistle. -This is real cop work.
translation.zh: -你有一支紧急哨-这是个真正的警察工作

translation.en: There is nothing about you that makes a man a man, okay?
translation.zh: 在你身上没有任何使一个男人是男人的东西，好吗？

translation.en: You got no gun, no car, no wife, and now you got no partner.
translation.zh: 你没有枪，没有车，没有妻子现在你没有搭档

translation.en: Leave me alone.
translation.zh: 让我自己待会儿

translation.en: A mutt case.
translation.zh: 一件傻逼案子

translation.en: Terry, I am a cop, for your information, okay?
translation.zh: 特里，我是一名警察，让你知道，好吗？

translation.en: A broken partnership.
translation.zh: 破裂的搭档关系

translation.en: I'm a cop!
translation.zh: 我是个警察！

translation.en: And getting busted down to a shitty assignment.
translation.zh: 去调查一件糟糕的案子

translation.en: Allen and Terry hit the trifecta.
translation.zh: 艾伦和特里中了大奖

translation.en: But sometimes when you get your ass kicked...
translation.zh: 但是有时候当你被踢了屁股的时候

translation.en: ...that's when you find out what's real...
translation.zh: 就是你发现什么是真实的时候...

translation.en: ...and what needs doing.
translation.zh: ...以及需要做什么

translation.en: Whether it's directing traffic...
translation.zh: 不论是指挥交通...

translation.en: Come on!
translation.zh: 加油！

translation.en: ...or cracking a multibillion dollar fraud.
translation.zh: ...或者是侦破亿万级的美元欺诈案

translation.en: -Do you work here? -Yeah, I do.
translation.zh: -你在这儿工作吗？-是的

translation.en: The wrecking ball that crashed into Castien down there.
translation.zh: 在那儿落锤破碎球砸进了加斯第安珠宝店

translation.en: They also did damage to your office?
translation.zh: 他们也给你的办公室造成了损失？

translation.en: Some police officers came by and sealed it off.
translation.zh: 一些警官来了把它封锁起来

translation.en: Do you recall what they looked like?
translation.zh: 你能想起他们看起来是什么样子吗？

translation.en: One of them had an Australian accent.
translation.zh: 他们中的一个有澳大利亚口音

translation.en: You don't happen to do any business for the state lottery, do you?
translation.zh: 你不是碰巧为国家彩票服务吧，是吗？

translation.en: No. Our main client is Lendl Global.
translation.zh: 不是，我们的主要客户是兰德国际

translation.en: Can I ask what this is about?
translation.zh: 我能问问这个是什么吗？

translation.en: Gator needs his gat, you punkass bitch!
translation.zh: 盖特需要他的手枪，你这个没用的婊子！

translation.en: Because that's what a real cop is.
translation.zh: 因为那才是一个真正的警察

translation.en: No, I didn't say "Lock her up." I never said, "Lock her up."
translation.zh: 不，我没有说"把她铐起来"我从没有说，"把她铐起来"

translation.en: A guy who does what needs to be done.
translation.zh: 一个去做需要完成的事情的人

translation.en: A guy who knows how to use his dark side for good.
translation.zh: 一个知道如何正确利用他的阴暗面的人

translation.en: And then you move to Florida.
translation.zh: 然后你就搬到佛罗里达

translation.en: One, two, three, attack!
translation.zh: 一、二、三，袭击！

translation.en: Terry, it's me.
translation.zh: 特里，是我

translation.en: -Tap out. Tap out. -It's me, Allen.
translation.zh: -敲出来，敲出来-是我，艾伦

translation.en: Are you tapping out, or are you hitting me in the face?
translation.zh: 你是在敲出来还是在打我的脸？

translation.en: I'm tapping you out!
translation.zh: 我在敲出来！

translation.en: You crazy? What are you doing, man?
translation.zh: 你疯了吗？你在做什么，伙计？

translation.en: -They might be watching us. -Could've killed you.
translation.zh: -他们可能正在看着我们-可以杀了你

translation.en: -Turn out the lights. Could be watching. -Who?
translation.zh: -把灯关了-什么？ -他们可能在看着我们-谁？

translation.en: I found some big information, okay?
translation.zh: 我有些重大消息，好吗？

translation.en: -About what? -Some scary shit, Terry. This is big.
translation.zh: -关于什么？-一些骇人的狗屎，特里，是大事件

translation.en: How'd you get in here? This place is foolproof.
translation.zh: 你怎么进来的？这里是不会让蠢蛋进来的

translation.en: -We can't be too careful. -What are you talking about?
translation.zh: -我们再小心也不为过-你在说什么？

translation.en: -This place might be bugged. -There's no bugs in here.
translation.zh: -这个地方可能有窃听器-这儿没有窃听器

translation.en: First off, I missed you.
translation.zh: 首先，我想念你

translation.en: -What's going on? -Did you hear what I said?
translation.zh: -发生什么事了？-你听见我说什么了吗？

translation.en: -Fine, I kind of missed you too. -Thank you.
translation.zh: -好吧，我也有点想念你-谢谢

translation.en: Okay. I found out whose losses Ershon has to cover.
translation.zh: 好吧，我发现了厄肖要赔偿谁的损失

translation.en: -It's Lendl Global. -What?
translation.zh: -是兰德国际-什么？

translation.en: Lendl staged the Castien robbery as a distraction...
translation.zh: 兰德在幕后策划加斯第安劫案来分散注意

translation.en: ...so they could break into their own accounting firm next door.
translation.zh: 这样他们就可以潜进自己隔壁的会计公司

translation.en: They then altered all the records to cover the losses...
translation.zh: 他们偷换了所有的记录来掩盖损失

translation.en: ...that Ershon had cost them through all of his bad investments.
translation.zh: 那些损失都是厄肖糟糕的投资造成的

translation.en: You're not supposed to be doing this. You're supposed to be walking the beat.
translation.zh: 你不应该在做这个事情你应该正在街上执勤

translation.en: I know. Pretty tricky, though, huh?
translation.zh: 我知道，很复杂，哈？

translation.en: This is bad, Allen. This is bad.
translation.zh: 这不好，艾伦，这不好

translation.en: No wonder the captain wanted us to stay out of this.
translation.zh: 警长当然想要我们置身事外

translation.en: Yeah, I bet Beaman started asking questions.
translation.zh: 是的，我打赌比曼看出问题了

translation.en: -That's why they killed him. -Man.
translation.zh: -那就是他们为什么要杀了他-伙计

translation.en: Here's the other thing.
translation.zh: 还有一件事

translation.en: Tomorrow, there's a massive business deal going down.
translation.zh: 明天，将会有一笔重大交易

translation.en: Ershon's leading it.
translation.zh: 厄肖牵头的

translation.en: I still can't figure out who the poor sucker is they're making the deal with...
translation.zh: 我还是不知道谁是那个可怜的倒霉鬼和他们做交易

translation.en: but we gotta stop it.
translation.zh: 但是我们得阻止它

translation.en: It's time to let the peacock fly.
translation.zh: 是孔雀飞的时候了

translation.en: I'm not going, Allen. I like what I do.
translation.zh: 我不去，艾伦，我喜欢我做的事情

translation.en: So do I. We're cops.
translation.zh: 我也是，我们是警察

translation.en: No. I like what I do now. I like working traffic. It's a great gig.
translation.zh: 不，我喜欢我现在做的事情我喜欢指挥交通，是项很棒的娱乐活动

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: I like working traffic. I'm not going with you.
translation.zh: 我喜欢交通警察的工作，我不会和你去的

translation.en: What is this traffic bullshit?
translation.zh: 这交通是什么狗屎？

translation.en: -What are you talking about? -I'm talking about my life.
translation.zh: -你在说什么呢？-我在说我的生活

translation.en: The corner I run on 54th and 3rd Avenue? It hums.
translation.zh: 是第54街和第3大道的交通路口？那里塞车了

translation.en: It's Terry's intersection. And the traffic guys? They're good guys.
translation.zh: 那是特里的十字路口那些交通警察？他们是好人

translation.en: There's this one guy, Phillip? He can pee in the urinal from 20 feet.
translation.zh: 还有个叫菲利浦？他能从20英尺外尿进便池

translation.en: You've gotta see it, Allen. You've got to.
translation.zh: 你得见见，艾伦，你得见见

translation.en: What happened to you? What happened to this being our time?
translation.zh: 你怎么了？我们一起的时间怎么了？

translation.en: No way, Allen. I'm out. I'm done.
translation.zh: 没门，艾伦，我不干，结束了

translation.en: -Get in the car. -Come on. We both know it's wooden.
translation.zh: -上车-快，艾伦，我们都知道那是木头的

translation.en: -Apartment pop. Now get in the car. -You're not gonna shoot me.
translation.zh: -公寓开枪，现在上车来-你不会开枪射我的

translation.en: Okay, I'll be honest. This is only the second time I've ever fired this.
translation.zh: 好吧，我说实话这只是我第二次开枪

translation.en: So stop pointing it at me.
translation.zh: 那么别用枪指着我了

translation.en: Look, tomorrow morning, all I know is I'm going to Mauch, all right?
translation.zh: 看，明天早上，我会去毛奇那儿，好吗？

translation.en: For what? He doesn't care.
translation.zh: 为什么？他不在乎

translation.en: He's been dodging this case for too long and I want answers.
translation.zh: 他逃避这个案子太久了我要的是答案

translation.en: I want him to look me in the eye and tell me why.
translation.zh: 我想要让他看着我的眼睛并且告诉我为什么

translation.en: Turn on the news, man. Nobody cares.
translation.zh: 打开新闻，伙计，没人在乎

translation.en: I hope I'm not alone.
translation.zh: 我希望我并不孤单

translation.en: Hope you bring it.
translation.zh: 希望你带着它

translation.en: We got a big day out there. Big one.
translation.zh: 今天是个大日子，大日子

translation.en: We got a full moon. People are gonna be amped, all right?
translation.zh: 我们有满月人们会被放大，对吗？

translation.en: Let's see what we got on hot tips, all right?
translation.zh: 来看看从热门提示里能得到什么，对吗？

translation.en: The new bathmats are in.
translation.zh: 新的浴室防滑垫到货了

translation.en: One more thing. We got a serial rapist in Crown Heights.
translation.zh: 还有就是皇冠高地出现了一名连环作案的强奸犯

translation.en: Jeez, I'm sorry. That's from my other job. Ignore that. Forget that.
translation.zh: 神啊，我很抱歉，那是我的另一项工作别在意，把它忘了

translation.en: Well, don't ignore it.
translation.zh: 嗯，别忽略它

translation.en: If you live in Crown Heights, you know, walk in pairs.
translation.zh: 如果你住在皇冠高地你知道的，两人出行

translation.en: Gene Mauch to kitchen accessories. Gene Mauch to kitchen accessories.
translation.zh: 基因毛奇到厨房配件部基因毛奇到厨房配件部

translation.en: I gotta go. Go get them. Let's be careful out there.
translation.zh: 我要走了，去抓他们我们到那儿得小心点

translation.en: The oak.
translation.zh: 橡木

translation.en: I like to keep the oak together and the maple separately, okay?
translation.zh: 我喜欢把橡木放在一起保存而把枫叶分开，好吗？

translation.en: And these chopping boards?
translation.zh: 这些是切菜板吗？

translation.en: Hey, captain.
translation.zh: 嘿，警长

translation.en: Hey, Allen. Hey, how you doing?
translation.zh: 嘿，艾伦，嘿，你怎么样？

translation.en: What are you doing here? Are you here for the bathmats?
translation.zh: 你来这儿做什么？你是为了买浴室防滑垫来的？

translation.en: -I need you to be straight with me. -Straight with us.
translation.zh: -你跟我得直接点-直接点

translation.en: Hey, Terry. Look at this.
translation.zh: 嘿，特里，看这个

translation.en: -I thought you were working traffic today. -Let them block the box.
translation.zh: -我以为你今天会是交通警-让他们封锁街区

translation.en: -Besides, partners' code, right? -Thanks.
translation.zh: -还有，搭档规矩，是吗？-谢谢

translation.en: Hey, why have you worked your ass off trying to kill this case?
translation.zh: 嘿，你为什么要封杀这个案子呢？

translation.en: All right, fine. I'm gonna tell you guys something.
translation.zh: 好吧，好的我来告诉你们一些事情

translation.en: You really went into deep water on this one. You really went in deep.
translation.zh: 这一回你们淌了一潭深水你们陷得太深了

translation.en: Ershon's connected to all the higher ups...
translation.zh: 厄肖和上面所有的人都有关系

translation.en: ...and I gotta save what little ass I have left, okay?
translation.zh: 我在拯救自己，好吗？

translation.en: You keep hiding from shit in the world...
translation.zh: 你一直在回避世上的狗屎

translation.en: ...and eventually the world comes to your front door.
translation.zh: 最后世界来到你的前门

translation.en: -Nice. -That's very nice.
translation.zh: -棒极了-那非常棒

translation.en: I heard it in an episode of Touched By An Angel.
translation.zh: 我从《天使在人间》的一段插曲中听来的

translation.en: You keep this thing real quiet, and you make sure you have real evidence...
translation.zh: 你让这事情真的平静下来你要确定你有真正的证据

translation.en: ...and maybe I'll see what I can do.
translation.zh: 或许来看看我能做什么

translation.en: But if you make a lot of noise...
translation.zh: 但是如果你弄出许多声响

translation.en: ...and you attract the media attention, and you bring the DA in on this...
translation.zh: 并且引起了媒体的注意把地方检察官牵扯进来

translation.en: ...I am out, okay?
translation.zh: 我就退出，好吗？

translation.en: Yeah, we'll go in there like church mice.
translation.zh: 好，我们像教堂里的老鼠一样悄无声息

translation.en: But there's one case, one case in a career where you go all in.
translation.zh: 但是有一种情况在警察生涯里碰到这种情况你们都会进去

translation.en: This is it.
translation.zh: 就是这个

translation.en: All right. Then you do us proud.
translation.zh: 好吧，那么给我们演出好戏

translation.en: Because I don't want no scrubs.
translation.zh: 因为我可不想有差错

translation.en: -Really? -No.
translation.zh: -真的吗？-不

translation.en: -You're not aware that's a TLC song? -I have no idea what you're talking about.
translation.zh: -你没有意识到那是一首TLC组合的歌？-我不知道你在说什么

translation.en: -Second time. -You said chasing waterfalls...
translation.zh: -第二次-你说过追逐瀑布

translation.en: ...now you're saying you don't want no scrubs.
translation.zh: 现在你却说你不想有差错

translation.en: -I don't even understand the reference. -It's like a tic.
translation.zh: -我甚至都不明白这个引用-这就像痉挛

translation.en: I have no idea what you're talking about.
translation.zh: 我不知道你在说些什么

translation.en: Remember, this thing gets messy, we never talked.
translation.zh: 记住，这件事变得糟糕起来我们从没谈起过

translation.en: -You can trust us. -Real quiet.
translation.zh: -你可以信任我们-要真的没有动静

translation.en: You gotta creep. Creep.
translation.zh: 你变得怪怪的，很奇怪

translation.en: Come on.
translation.zh: 得了吧

translation.en: You don't say "Creep-creep" unless you're quoting TLC.
translation.zh: 除非你是引用TLC组合的话否则你不会说"怪怪的-怪怪的"

translation.en: Hey, guys.
translation.zh: 嘿，伙计们

translation.en: You know Danson and Highsmith were not good cops, right?
translation.zh: 你们知道道森和海史密斯不是好警察，是吗？

translation.en: Yeah, I guess we kind of knew that, but it's a drag.
translation.zh: 是的，我想我们知道些但是这真是件无聊的事

translation.en: I mean, at a certain point, who's left to be a hero?
translation.zh: 我是说，从某一点来说剩下的人谁会成为英雄呢？

translation.en: Not to be corny, maybe it's you guys.
translation.zh: 别老套了，也许就是你们

translation.en: You ready?
translation.zh: 你准备好了吗？

translation.en: -Yeah. -Let's go.
translation.zh: -是的-我们走

translation.en: -No, but the highlights are great. -Thank you.
translation.zh: -不，但是最精彩的部分棒极了-谢谢

translation.en: -Sexy but serious. -Thank you.
translation.zh: -性感而严肃-谢谢

translation.en: Excuse me.
translation.zh: 打扰一下

translation.en: Who the hell are all these people? I was only expecting one man.
translation.zh: 这些人究竟是谁？我只等一个人

translation.en: You know, they're just some people I owe money to who wanted to be here.
translation.zh: 你知道的，他们只是一些想来这儿问我要回欠款的人

translation.en: Who are they?
translation.zh: 他们是谁？

translation.en: Well, they are some Chechen patriots, entrepreneurs.
translation.zh: 嗯，他们是一些车臣爱国者，企业家

translation.en: And the black chaps are some businessmen from Nigeria.
translation.zh: 那些黑人是一些从尼日利亚来的商人

translation.en: You owe money to the Nigerians and Chechens?
translation.zh: 你欠尼日利亚和车臣人的钱？

translation.en: Yes. Yes, I do.
translation.zh: 是的，是的，我欠他们钱

translation.en: -You're a piece of work. -Thank you.
translation.zh: -你真是个人才-谢谢

translation.en: Probably best to get started.
translation.zh: 最好现在开始

translation.en: This is good, baby. We're in the game, we know the score.
translation.zh: 这很好，宝贝我们开始比赛，我们知道比分

translation.en: The only thing that bugs me is we still don't know who Ershon's targeting.
translation.zh: 唯一让我烦扰的是我们仍然不知道厄肖的目标是什么

translation.en: -Is it the lotto? Who is it? -Who cares? Some rich prick.
translation.zh: -是乐透吗？那是谁？-谁在乎？一些有钱的蠢货

translation.en: I have to tell you, I am tremendously excited by this deal.
translation.zh: 我得告诉你我对这个交易非常的兴奋

translation.en: And I can assure you that every dime of your money...
translation.zh: 我能向你保证你的每分钱

translation.en: ...will be invested with the utmost diligence.
translation.zh: 都会被投资得相当小心

translation.en: Your rates of return are really exciting.
translation.zh: 你的收益非常丰厚

translation.en: We think our members are gonna be just thrilled.
translation.zh: 我想我们的成员会非常的高兴

translation.en: Yeah. I mean, we've averaged, like, 18 percent over the last 10 years.
translation.zh: 是的，我们比过去十年平均增长了18%

translation.en: All right. Quiet as a church mouse, in and out.
translation.zh: 好的像教堂的老鼠，悄无声息

translation.en: I can feel that tingling in my balls you were talking about.
translation.zh: 我能感受得到你所说的睾丸里的刺痛感

translation.en: Beautiful.
translation.zh: 漂亮

translation.en: All right, listen up.
