translation.zh: 好的，听好

translation.en: I am Detective Gamble. This is Detective Hoitz.
translation.zh: 我是警探甘布尔这是警探霍伊茨

translation.en: We need your cooperation.
translation.zh: 我们需要您的合作

translation.en: David Ershon.
translation.zh: 戴维厄肖

translation.en: You're under arrest for fraud, embezzlement...
translation.zh: 你因涉嫌诈骗，挪用公款被捕

translation.en: ...and in connection to the murder of Don Beaman.
translation.zh: 以及和道恩比曼的谋杀案有关联

translation.en: This is a bad idea.
translation.zh: 这可不是个好主意

translation.en: Hey, guys.
translation.zh: 嘿，伙计们

translation.en: Bob? What are you doing here?
translation.zh: 鲍勃？你在这儿干什么？

translation.en: I'm investing.
translation.zh: 我在投资

translation.en: Do you remember we talked about that proxy vote a while back?
translation.zh: 记得我们以前谈过的代理投票吗？

translation.en: -This is what it was for. -Holy shit.
translation.zh: -就是这个-天啊

translation.en: It's a more aggressive investment strategy for the pension.
translation.zh: 对于养老基金来说这是一项更激进的投资

translation.en: Allen! We're the suckers. They're targeting the police pension fund.
translation.zh: 艾伦！我们真是衰人他们的目标是警察养老基金

translation.en: Gentlemen, you're here illegally and without a warrant.
translation.zh: 先生们，你们在这儿是违法的而且没有搜查令

translation.en: We are within our rights to take action.
translation.zh: 我们在职权范围内执行行动

translation.en: So much for quiet as church mice!
translation.zh: 就像教堂里的老鼠一样那么安静！

translation.en: Go!
translation.zh: 跑！

translation.en: Who the hell are those guys?
translation.zh: 这些家伙到底是谁？

translation.en: Gentlemen, I can get you obstructed view tickets for Rock of Ages.
translation.zh: 先生们，我可以给你们观看《摇滚时代》的非全景票

translation.en: Even I admit that's not very tempting, but I'm not made of tickets, God damn it!
translation.zh: 即使我承认那并不怎么诱人，但我不是票做的，他妈的！

translation.en: Jeanie! Get over here! You, go get in the bloody car.
translation.zh: 杰妮！快过来！你，赶快上车

translation.en: That's it, mate.
translation.zh: 就是这车，伙计

translation.en: I have had it with this joker and his wooden gun.
translation.zh: 是我和这个讲笑话的小丑的车还有他的木头手枪

translation.en: They're gonna kill me. And then they will kill you.
translation.zh: 他们会杀了我然后他们会杀了你

translation.en: -Well, I'm gonna kill you first! -And then they will kill me.
translation.zh: -那我先把你杀了！-然后他们会杀了我

translation.en: We have two rogue police officers. They are armed and dangerous...
translation.zh: 有两位行为失常的警官他们持枪并且极其危险

translation.en: -...and holding David Ershon hostage. -Stupid pricks!
translation.zh: -挟持戴维厄肖作人质-愚蠢的有钱人！

translation.en: -It's us, we're good guys! -Exactly. They're the good guys.
translation.zh: -是我们，我们是好人！-没错，他们是好人

translation.en: Where do we go? Where do we go?
translation.zh: 我们去哪？

translation.en: I have a small apartment. No one knows about it.
translation.zh: 我有个小公寓没人知道

translation.en: I use it mainly for my parents and prostitutes.
translation.zh: 我主要用它来安顿我的父母和妓女

translation.en: Not at the same time. That would be wrong.
translation.zh: 不是同时住，那是不对的

translation.en: Let's hear it from the top, every detail.
translation.zh: 我们从头开始，每个细节

translation.en: I think the best way to tell the story is by starting at the end, briefly...
translation.zh: 我想最好是先讲一下故事大概的结尾

translation.en: ...then going back to the beginning, and then periodically returning to the end...
translation.zh: 然后再回到开头逐步讲到结尾

translation.en: ...maybe giving different characters' perspectives throughout.
translation.zh: 也许把每个角色的视角也说一遍

translation.en: Just to give it a bit of dynamism, otherwise, it's just sort of a linear story.
translation.zh: 只是增加点特色否则会像流水账

translation.en: Just tell us what happened.
translation.zh: 就告诉我们发生了什么

translation.en: I lost a bunch of money from some people and now they want it back.
translation.zh: 我把一些人的钱弄丢了现在他们想把钱拿回去

translation.en: What about Don Beaman?
translation.zh: 那道恩比曼是怎么回事？

translation.en: Beaman knew that I had falsified my financials...
translation.zh: 比曼知道我窜改了我的财务报告

translation.en: ...so they sent down Wesley to try and keep him quiet.
translation.zh: 于是他们派了韦斯利来试着让他闭嘴

translation.en: He forced him at gunpoint to drink a bunch of gin...
translation.zh: 他们用枪逼着他喝下许多杜松子酒

translation.en: ...and then forced him onto the ledge.
translation.zh: 然后强迫他走上窗台

translation.en: It was only a matter of time before he fell.
translation.zh: 他掉下去只是时间的问题

translation.en: At least we stopped you from getting the pension fund.
translation.zh: 至少我们阻止了你拿到养老基金

translation.en: Well, but, yeah, but you didn't. It's already in my account.
translation.zh: 但，是的，但你们没有钱已经在我账户里了

translation.en: By 9:00 in the morning, it goes into the Lendl equity fund...
translation.zh: 到上午9:00，钱已经转入了兰德权益基金

translation.en: ...and from there it's transferred to a dozen offshore accounts.
translation.zh: 然后被转到许多个离岸账户

translation.en: By 9:01, it's gone.
translation.zh: 9点零一分，钱就没了

translation.en: -Well, what if we stop the transfer? -But you can't. I mean, there's a....
translation.zh: -如果我们阻止转账会怎么样？-但你阻止不了，有个...

translation.en: What if we stop the transfer?
translation.zh: 如果我们阻止转账会怎么样？

translation.en: You'd have to be at Endemic Bank for 9:00 exactly...
translation.zh: 你们最好在9:00整准时赶到安德米克银行

translation.en: ...find the clerk, get the routing number.
translation.zh: 找到办事员拿到过户号码

translation.en: -We gotta stop it. -There's no way.
translation.zh: 我们得阻止它 这不可能

translation.en: Every cop, the crazy Australian and his crew, they'll all be after us.
translation.zh: 每个警察，疯狂的澳大利亚人和他的小组他们都不会放过我们的

translation.en: You could let me go, and I'll give you $10 million each.
translation.zh: 你把我放了我给你们每人一千万

translation.en: -It's not a bribe. -Of course it's a bribe.
translation.zh: -这不是贿赂-当然是贿赂

translation.en: You're offering to pay us money to not do our job.
translation.zh: 你付我们钱让我们不完成自己的任务

translation.en: It's not a bribe.
translation.zh: 这不是贿赂

translation.en: We hang low here tonight. Nobody knows about this place.
translation.zh: 我们今晚就待在这儿没人知道这个地方

translation.en: We'll be safe. And tomorrow, we hit it.
translation.zh: 我们会没事的，明天，我们会准时到银行

translation.en: -First things first, I gotta go see Sheila. -No way, it's too dangerous.
translation.zh: 首先，我得去看看希拉 不行，太危险了

translation.en: Look, Terry, we don't know what's gonna happen to us tomorrow...
translation.zh: 看，特里，我们不知道明天在我们身上会发生什么事情

translation.en: ...but tonight, I need to make things right with Sheila.
translation.zh: 但是今晚我需要和希拉把事情处理好

translation.en: All right, go. Go. Be careful.
translation.zh: 好吧，去吧，小心

translation.en: Thanks, I will.
translation.zh: 谢谢，我会的

translation.en: Will you say hi to Sheila for me?
translation.zh: 帮我跟希拉问好？

translation.en: -Okay. -Okay.
translation.zh: -好的-好

translation.en: Tell her. Say Terry was asking about you.
translation.zh: 告诉她，说特里问起你来

translation.en: He wants to make sure you know...
translation.zh: 他想让你知道

translation.en: ...that he'll be there for you if anything happens.
translation.zh: 无论发生什么事情他都会为了你而出现在那儿

translation.en: -Yeah. -Drop of a hat, I'm there.
translation.zh: -是的-摘下帽子，我在那儿

translation.en: Look, it's starting to get a little weird, man.
translation.zh: 看，有点变得奇怪了，伙计

translation.en: If something happens to you, I need to be there to take care of her.
translation.zh: 如果你发生了什么事我需要站出来照顾她

translation.en: All of her wants, her needs, and desires are now my responsibility.
translation.zh: 她所有的希望，她的需求和欲望现在都成为了我的责任

translation.en: Why do you say it like it's a predetermined thing?
translation.zh: 你为什么说得就好像一定会发生的事情？

translation.en: Just go, man.
translation.zh: 去吧，伙计

translation.en: Okay. Thanks.
translation.zh: 好吧，谢谢

translation.en: Go.
translation.zh: 去吧

translation.en: Janeco Gallery.
translation.zh: 珍妮科画廊

translation.en: Francine, it's Terry. Please don't hang up.
translation.zh: 弗朗辛，是特里，请不要挂线

translation.en: Please pick up.
translation.zh: 请接电话

translation.en: Hello.
translation.zh: 你好

translation.en: Hey, sweetie. I was praying you'd be at your mom's house.
translation.zh: 嘿，宝贝我在祈祷你在你妈妈家里

translation.en: You know what, I can't talk any more. I think the phone's being tapped.
translation.zh: 你知道吗，我不能再多说了我想电话被窃听了

translation.en: Baby, where are you? I wanna see you.
translation.zh: 宝贝，你在哪？我想见你

translation.en: I'm near the place where we did it three Halloweens ago.
translation.zh: 我就在三年前的万圣节我们见面的地方附近

translation.en: Do you remember?
translation.zh: 你还记得吗？

translation.en: Okay, yeah, I got it.
translation.zh: 好吧，是的，我记得

translation.en: I'm just warning you, though. Watch out. I think they're watching the house.
translation.zh: 我只是提醒你，小心点我想他们监视着咱家

translation.en: Don't worry, sweetie. I think I have a way of talking to you.
translation.zh: 别担心，宝贝我想我有和你对话的办法了

translation.en: I have to admit, I wasn't gonna come. I mean....
translation.zh: 我得承认，我本不想来了我是说...

translation.en: After all those years, after the restraining order.
translation.zh: 这些年以后在禁令后

translation.en: I was worried I might not see you again.
translation.zh: 我很担心我可能会见不到你

translation.en: There's some very dangerous people after him...
translation.zh: 有一些危险的人在追杀他

translation.en: ...and now they're after us.
translation.zh: 现在他们在追踪我们

translation.en: It's just the old lady.
translation.zh: 只是她妈妈

translation.en: Hello, Allen.
translation.zh: 你好，艾伦

translation.en: Hello, Mama Ramos. What are you doing out here?
translation.zh: 你好，拉莫斯妈妈你在外面做什么呢？

translation.en: Sheila said she doesn't know what happened and she wants you back.
translation.zh: 希拉说她不知道发生了什么她想你回家

translation.en: -She also says... -Yes.
translation.zh: -她还说...-是的

translation.en: ...she wants you on top of her, holding her hair...
translation.zh: ...她想你在她上面抓着她的头发

translation.en: ...and riding her like a bucking bronco...
translation.zh: 像在野马背上颠簸一样骑着她

translation.en: ...while she sucks your thumb and says, "Mommy likey."
translation.zh: 而她吮吸你的拇指说"妈妈爱这样"

translation.en: You-- You tell your daughter....
translation.zh: 你，你告诉你的女儿...

translation.en: He said he'll always love you.
translation.zh: 他说他永远爱你

translation.en: And he's so happy that you're having his child.
translation.zh: 他很高兴你有了他的孩子

translation.en: Allen.
translation.zh: 他很高兴你有了他的孩子 艾伦

translation.en: He also says...
translation.zh: 他还说

translation.en: ...he wants you to stare into each other's eyes without blinking while you do it.
translation.zh: 在你们做的时候他希望你们不眨眼睛地彼此对视

translation.en: -I love when we do that, Mom. -And then afterward...
translation.zh: -我很喜欢那样做，妈妈-然后

translation.en: ...lick the sweat off each other.
translation.zh: 舔去彼此的汗水

translation.en: I don't wanna do this.
translation.zh: 我不想这样

translation.en: -You say things that are too personal. -Okay, but just one more thing.
translation.zh: -你们说的东西太隐私了-好吧，还剩一件事

translation.en: She said she loves you...
translation.zh: 她说她爱你

translation.en: ...and wants to hold your hand and have iced tea with you.
translation.zh: 想握着你的手和你一起喝冰茶

translation.en: Come on. That's not all she said.
translation.zh: 算了吧，那不是她说的

translation.en: No.
translation.zh: 不

translation.en: -She says other things, but I don't want-- -Please, please, please.
translation.zh: -她还说了其他的，但是我不想...-求你，求你，求你

translation.en: You don't realize, I may be killed tomorrow.
translation.zh: 你没有意识到，明天我可能就被杀了

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: She says she wants to unplug all the clocks and the phones...
translation.zh: 她说她想拔掉所有的钟表和电话线

translation.en: -...and have a three-day sex marathon. -That's more like it. Yeah.
translation.zh: -来一次三天的性爱马拉松-这才更像是她说的，是的

translation.en: She wants to walk wrong for a week because you guys did it so hard.
translation.zh: 她想出去放纵一个星期因为你们做得太剧烈

translation.en: That's just lovely.
translation.zh: 那真是太好了

translation.en: No more! He says things I can't say.
translation.zh: 没有了！他说了我不能说的东西

translation.en: It involves a mannequin hand and an electric shaver taped to a golf club.
translation.zh: 这还牵涉到人体模型的一只手和一把藏在高尔夫俱乐部的电动剃须刀

translation.en: Now what'd she say?
translation.zh: 现在她说什么？

translation.en: She says she loves you.
translation.zh: 她说她爱你

translation.en: I'm so sorry about everything.
translation.zh: 我对所发生的一切感到很抱歉

translation.en: And I just had to come here tonight to tell you that I love you.
translation.zh: 我今晚只是来告诉你我爱你

translation.en: And the reason why I act like you're a plain wife is that...
translation.zh: 我表现得把当你是一个平凡妻子的原因是

translation.en: ...I'm afraid that if I admit to how stunning...
translation.zh: 我怕如果我承认你是多么光彩照人

translation.en: ...and intelligent and wonderful you are...
translation.zh: 多么聪明、美好的话

translation.en: -...I'd just lose you. -Shut up, Allen. I love you.
translation.zh: -我会失去你-闭嘴，艾伦，我爱你

translation.en: We have a place that's safe. All right.
translation.zh: 我们有一个安全的藏身之处，好了

translation.en: I'm gonna break your hip.
translation.zh: 我要打你的屁股

translation.en: I'm about to do you grandpa-style.
translation.zh: 我会像你奶奶那样做

translation.en: I brought some music.
translation.zh: 我带了些音乐来

translation.en: Not what I would've chosen, but screw it.
translation.zh: 不是我挑的那些，去它的

translation.en: All right. Let's go, Monday morning, time to go to work.
translation.zh: 好吧，来吧，星期一早上是工作的时候了

translation.en: Let's do it.
translation.zh: 我们开始吧

translation.en: -You want my gate code? -Shut up, man!
translation.zh: -你要开门码吗？-闭嘴，伙计

translation.en: That's Wesley!
translation.zh: 那是韦斯利！

translation.en: Yes!
translation.zh: 是的！

translation.en: -Where'd you learn to drive like that? -"Grand Theft Auto!"
translation.zh: -你是从哪儿学的那样开车？-《侠盗猎车》

translation.en: Shit, Allen, they're coming.
translation.zh: 狗屎，艾伦，他们来了

translation.en: -Oh, my God! -Shit.
translation.zh: -哦，上帝啊！-狗屎

translation.en: -Do something, Allen! -Hold on, hold on.
translation.zh: -做点什么，艾伦！-坐稳了，坐稳

translation.en: Someone's been playing "Grand Theft Auto."
translation.zh: 有人在玩《侠盗猎车》

translation.en: I did that!
translation.zh: 我做到了！

translation.en: -I did that! -Oh, my God!
translation.zh: -我做到了！-哦，上帝啊！

translation.en: -That's what I'm talking about! -We jackknifed them!
translation.zh: -那就是我说的！-我们把他们的车撞弯了！

translation.en: Did you see that? It went backwards and then turned upside-down.
translation.zh: 你看见了吗？它跑到后面去了然后翻了个底朝天

translation.en: Gator turns vans upside-down like they're in a crazy washing machine!
translation.zh: 盖特把车撞了个底朝天就好像是台发疯的洗衣机一样！

translation.en: Why are you calling yourself Gator?
translation.zh: 你为什么叫自己盖特？

translation.en: It's a nickname I had in college. I used to run a dating service.
translation.zh: 那是我大学时候的外号我曾经经营过约会服务业务

translation.en: -He was a pimp. -Yeah, I was. I was a pimp.
translation.zh: -他是个皮条客-是的，我曾经是，我曾经是个皮条客

translation.en: Right now the streets are a bloodbath.
translation.zh: 现在马路上就是个血浴

translation.en: And, statistically speaking, there's about 30 kids in here...
translation.zh: 从数据上来说那儿有三十个孩子

translation.en: ...10 of you are gonna be dead before your next birthday.
translation.zh: 你们之中有10个人会在下一次过生日前死去

translation.en: Got a couple of tips, help you guys stay out of jail.
translation.zh: 看看这些提示让你们远离牢狱

translation.en: One, try your hardest to not be black or Hispanic.
translation.zh: 第一，尽量不要让自己是黑人或者拉丁人

translation.en: -It's a good tip. -Yeah. Two....
translation.zh: -一条不错的提示-是的，第二...

translation.en: Gentlemen, we got a hot one.
translation.zh: 先生们，这有热辣的一条

translation.en: Hoitz and Gamble have Ershon hostage, high-speed car chase in progress.
translation.zh: 霍伊茨和甘布尔劫持人质厄肖正在高速追车之中

translation.en: Yes! Gun, gun!
translation.zh: 是的！枪，枪！

translation.en: Pass up the guns. Pass them up. Let's go, people.
translation.zh: 把枪递过来，把它们递过来来吧，伙计们

translation.en: There we go. Anything, any Tasers? No?
translation.zh: 我们来了，任何东西，泰瑟枪？没有？

translation.en: -Good. Who wants to go on a ride-along? -I do!
translation.zh: 好吧，有谁想来搭个车？ 我想！

translation.en: All right, you, sweetie. Come on, let's go. Move.
translation.zh: 好吧，你，宝贝来吧，我们出发了，出发

translation.en: -Move! Let's go. -Come on!
translation.zh: -出发！我们来了-来吧！

translation.en: Cool, a helicopter! Must be covering the high-speed chase.
translation.zh: 酷，是一架直升机！一定是来给追车做掩护的

translation.en: Jesus!
translation.zh: 上帝啊！

translation.en: -Who are those guys? -They're Chechen investors.
translation.zh: -那些家伙是谁？-他们是车臣投资人

translation.en: We were gonna do a Chechen version of Dora the Explorer.
translation.zh: 我们是要来一个车臣版的《爱探险的朵拉》

translation.en: Anyway, it went terribly wrong.
translation.zh: 管他，事态发展得不对了

translation.en: I feel like it's not fair that they have a helicopter!
translation.zh: 他们有直升机我觉得这不公平

translation.en: Oh, no.
translation.zh: 哦，不

translation.en: Damn it.
translation.zh: 他妈的

translation.en: Watch your head. God, your hair is soft.
translation.zh: 小心你的头，上帝啊，你的头发很柔软

translation.en: VO5 Hot Oil.
translation.zh: 是VO5热油洗发水

translation.en: You're gonna wreck! There's cars coming from both directions!
translation.zh: 你会撞车的！两个方向都有来车！

translation.en: I'm not gonna wreck!
translation.zh: 我不会撞车的！

translation.en: -I'm gonna wreck! You're right! -You want me to drive?
translation.zh: -我要撞车了！你说对了！-你想我来开吗？

translation.en: -This was a very clever idea. -Yeah.
translation.zh: -这是个非常不错的主意-是的

translation.en: They're gone.
translation.zh: 他们走了

translation.en: Let's go.
translation.zh: 我们走

translation.en: They are Nigerians. Yeah, I'd forgotten about them.
translation.zh: 他们是尼日利亚人是的，我把他们给忘了

translation.en: -This is a shortcut. -Are you kidding? You cannot go there.
translation.zh: -这是个快捷方式-你在说笑吗？ 你不能那里下来

translation.en: What are you doing?
translation.zh: 你在做什么？

translation.en: Hit him!
translation.zh: 撞他！

translation.en: -Where are we? -Chelsea Pier.
translation.zh: -我们到哪儿了？-切尔西皮尔

translation.en: What the hell?
translation.zh: 什么鬼东西？

translation.en: Jesus!
translation.zh: 上帝啊！

translation.en: Them having a helicopter is definitely cheating.
translation.zh: 他们用直升机完全是作弊

translation.en: Go!
translation.zh: 快跑！

translation.en: Come on!
translation.zh: 快！

translation.en: We're cops! Hit the chopper!
translation.zh: 我们是警察！射那架直升机！

translation.en: This is Martin and Fosse, en route. Back off! This is our collar!
translation.zh: 这里是马丁和福斯，在赶往现场途中退后！这是我们的领衔

translation.en: Set up a perimeter. No arrests until we get there!
translation.zh: 设立一个隔离圈我们到那儿之前不要进行任何抓捕

translation.en: Take the light!
translation.zh: 别管灯！

translation.en: Do not authorize that transfer.
translation.zh: 不要给那个转账授权

translation.en: This is David Ershon. The transfer is for him.
translation.zh: 这是戴维厄肖，这是他要求的转账

translation.en: He will tell you not to authorize it, okay? Tell him.
translation.zh: 他会跟你说不要授权的，好吗？跟他说

translation.en: -Tell him! -Yeah, do as they say. Stop the transfer.
translation.zh: -跟他说！-是的，照他们说的去做，停止转账

translation.en: Approve it.
translation.zh: 批准

translation.en: Now.
translation.zh: 现在

translation.en: Do not touch anything!
translation.zh: 别碰任何东西！

translation.en: I swear to God I'll blow your head all over this desk.
translation.zh: 我对上帝发誓我会把你的头打爆，喷他一桌子

translation.en: Not a person in this room believes you'll shoot this clerk.
translation.zh: 这房间里没人相信你会杀了这个职员

translation.en: Yeah?
translation.zh: 是吗？

translation.en: Thank you so much, gentlemen, for the prompt delivery of Mr. Ershon.
translation.zh: 非常感谢，先生们为了厄肖先生的快速交易

translation.en: I have two competing bids from jilted investors.
translation.zh: 我收到了来自被遗弃的投资人的两份竞价

translation.en: They're at 30 million, and holding.
translation.zh: 开价3000万，并且持有

translation.en: -Wait! Can't you let me...? -Take him away.
translation.zh: -等等！你能让我...-把他带走

translation.en: But computers.
translation.zh: 但是电脑

translation.en: What if, one day, they were in charge?
translation.zh: 如果，有一天，他们负责怎么办？

translation.en: Now if you don't shut up, I will cut your ear off with a butter knife.
translation.zh: 现在如果你不闭嘴我就用黄油刀切掉你的耳朵

translation.en: That's blunt. Blunt's worse than if it's sharp.
translation.zh: 那刀很钝 钝比锋利还要糟

translation.en: Now!
translation.zh: 现在！

translation.en: You just stood there!
translation.zh: 你只是站在那儿！

translation.en: I didn't know that "now" meant that. How am I supposed to know that?
translation.zh: 我不知道"现在"是那个意思我为什么要知道那个？

translation.en: -I knew what that meant. -Shut up.
translation.zh: -我知道那是什么意思-闭嘴

translation.en: You kill us and you kill Ershon. You're out 30 million dollars.
translation.zh: 你杀了我们和厄肖你损失了3000万美元

translation.en: -Who's got the golden goose now, huh? -Yeah.
translation.zh: -那现在谁得到金鹅了，哈？-是的

translation.en: Shit!
translation.zh: 狗屎！

translation.en: He's still valuable with a bullet wound, mate.
translation.zh: 他中了一枪但是还有价值，伙计

translation.en: He immediately called your bluff.
translation.zh: 他立即声称你在吹牛

translation.en: Get up. And kill the police.
translation.zh: 站起来，杀了警察

translation.en: I just wanna make sure I get it right.
translation.zh: 我只是想确认我做得对

translation.en: Did you want this transfer approved or not approved?
translation.zh: 你想批准交易还是不批准？

translation.en: You, mate, I'm gonna kill just for fun.
translation.zh: 你，伙计，我会杀人来找乐子

translation.en: Police, don't move! Drop your weapons!
translation.zh: 警察，别动！放下武器！

translation.en: Drop it, or be dropped, homeboy!
translation.zh: 放下，或者被打到丢下武器，家庭妇男！

translation.en: I hope you like prison food and penis.
translation.zh: 我希望你会喜欢牢饭和那里的阳具

translation.en: -Police! Down on the ground! -Let me see your hands!
translation.zh: -警察！趴到地上！-让我看到你的手！

translation.en: -Hey, hey, you okay? -Hey.
translation.zh: -嘿，嘿，你还好吗？-嘿

translation.en: Hey, Gene. Captain. I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 嘿，基因，警长，我很抱歉

translation.en: -I'm sorry. -That's okay. Don't worry about it.
translation.zh: -我很抱歉-没关系，别担心

translation.en: You can call me Gene when we're not in the office.
translation.zh: 在办公室外面你可以叫我基因

translation.en: Okay. Thanks for coming by.
translation.zh: 好的，谢谢来访

translation.en: Attaboy.
translation.zh: 好样的

translation.en: Come on, stay with me. Stay with me.
translation.zh: 来，跟我一起，跟我待在一起

translation.en: We're losing him! We're losing him! He's dying!
translation.zh: 我们要失去他了！我们要失去他了！他要死了！

translation.en: No. No, no, no, no. I'm just resting. I'm just resting.
translation.zh: 不，不，不，我只是在休息我只是在休息

translation.en: -I'm sorry. Did I hurt you? -I was just resting.
translation.zh: -我很抱歉，我伤到你了吗？-我只是在休息

translation.en: -Are you all right? -Just resting.
translation.zh: -你还好吗？-只是在休息

translation.en: Hey, let me tell you something.
translation.zh: 嘿，让我告诉你些事情

translation.en: As far as paperwork goes, we'll take care of it.
translation.zh: 至于材料工作我们会做的

translation.en: -You know why? -Why?
translation.zh: -你知道为什么吗？-为什么？

translation.en: Ain't too proud to beg.
translation.zh: 太骄傲了，不能乞求你

translation.en: Come on.
translation.zh: 算了吧

translation.en: -What? -It's not funny anymore.
translation.zh: -什么？-没什么乐子了

translation.en: -I don't know what you're talking about. -TLC references.
translation.zh: -我不知道你在说什么-引用TLC

translation.en: Still nothing. I swear to you.
translation.zh: 还是什么都没有，我向你发誓

translation.en: I'm gonna go over and check on Terry. I got a bad knee. Hold on. There you go.
translation.zh: 我要过去看看特里怎么样了我的膝盖很糟，坚持住，就这样

translation.en: It was the king of the mutt cases...
translation.zh: 这是一个最糟的案件

translation.en: ...but Allen and Terry had worked it like stars.
translation.zh: 但是艾伦和特里把它办得极具星味

translation.en: Within 24 hours of learning about Ershon's scheme...
translation.zh: 在24小时内得知厄肖的计划

translation.en: ...and Lendl's massive losses...
translation.zh: 和兰德的巨额亏损

translation.en: ...the government issued TARP funds to bail out Lendl.
translation.zh: 政府发行TARP基金来紧急援助兰德

translation.en: Lendl is in everything, and we're gonna go everywhere....
translation.zh: 兰德涉足各个领域而我们也将无处不在...

translation.en: They were too big to fail.
translation.zh: 它们太大了以至于不能倒下

translation.en: Ershon now resides in Palomino Federal Correctional Facility in Florida.
translation.zh: 厄肖现在在佛罗里达的巴洛米诺联邦教养所

translation.en: He still invests. Currency's just different.
translation.zh: 他仍然从事投资，只是使用的货币不同了

translation.en: Roger Wesley was linked to the Beaman murder...
translation.zh: 安全监控录像显示罗杰韦斯利涉嫌与比曼被谋杀一案有关

translation.en: ...by security cam footage which Martin and Fosse hadn't checked.
translation.zh: 安全监控录像显示罗杰韦斯利涉嫌与比曼被谋杀一案有关 马丁和福斯并没有查看这段录像

translation.en: It only showed the back of their heads.
translation.zh: 录像只拍到了他们的后脑

translation.en: But Allen's Faceback app was able to get a match to their faces.
translation.zh: 但是艾伦的后脸软件可以将此和他们的脸对应起来

translation.en: Terry married Francine.
translation.zh: 特里娶了弗朗辛

translation.en: He played harp at the reception and it was beautiful.
translation.zh: 他在婚宴上弹了竖琴弹得非常好

translation.en: He had learned how to play it in the eighth grade...
translation.zh: 那是他在八年级的时候学的

translation.en: ...to make fun of the fairy that lived up the street.
translation.zh: 用来取笑住在街上的男同性恋

translation.en: Terry asked Sheila to be his best man, but she declined.
translation.zh: 特里请希拉作他的伴郎但是希拉回绝了

translation.en: Let's be honest, we all wanna be superstars and hotshots.
translation.zh: 实话实说我们都想成为超级明星和能人

translation.en: But guess what.
translation.zh: 但猜怎么着？

translation.en: The people that do the real work, the ones that make the difference...
translation.zh: 那些真正工作的人们使这个世界变得不同

translation.en: ...you don't see them on TV or on the front page.
translation.zh: 在电视上或者封面上你看不到他们

translation.en: I'm talking about the day-in, day-outers, the grinders.
translation.zh: 我说的是日以继夜、饱受研磨而工作的人

translation.en: Come on, man, you know who I'm talking about: the other guys.
translation.zh: 来吧，伙计，你知道我在说什么：二流警探

translation.en: Goldman Sachs. This case is gonna be nasty.
translation.zh: 高盛银行这个案子将会很讨厌

translation.en: Hi. Cute glasses.
translation.zh: 嗨，帅气的眼镜

translation.en: -What was that? -What?
translation.zh: -那是什么？-什么？

translation.en: What? Dude, what is it with you and hot ladies? What's your secret?
translation.zh: 什么？伙计，你和热辣女郎是怎么回事？你有什么秘密？

translation.en: Honestly, I have no idea what you're talking about.
translation.zh: 诚实地说，我不知道你在说什么

translation.en: Tell me who you lost your virginity to.
translation.zh: 跟我说说你的处子之身给了谁了

translation.en: She actually became a TV actress. Heather Locklear.
translation.zh: 她后来成为了电视明星海瑟洛克莱尔

translation.en: Heather Locklear, what?
translation.zh: 海瑟洛克莱尔，什么？

translation.en: -You've heard of her? -Come on!
translation.zh: -你听说过她吗？-拜托！

translation.en: -She was much chubbier back then. -I don't get it. I really, I don't get it.
translation.zh: 她那个时候更加丰满我不明白，我真的，真的搞不懂

translation.en: That was you. You don't have a sense of humor.
translation.zh: 那是你你没有幽默感

translation.en: I do. I have a wonderful sense of humor.
translation.zh: 我有...我有非常好的幽默感

translation.en: All right, I'm gonna tell you the best joke in the world.
translation.zh: 好吧，我给你讲讲世界上最棒的笑话

translation.en: -We'll see if you laugh. -Please.
translation.zh: -来看看你会不会笑-请吧

translation.en: -I love jokes. -All right.
translation.zh: -我喜欢笑话-好吧

translation.en: There was these two guys, all right, partners, best friends.
translation.zh: 有两个家伙好吧，是搭档，好朋友

translation.en: -Going moose hunting. -Right.
translation.zh: -去猎麋鹿-好的

translation.en: Looking around. Everywhere they look, there's no moose.
translation.zh: 他们四处寻找他们找的地方，都没有麋鹿

translation.en: The guy's like, "You know what? We gotta split up.
translation.zh: 那两个家伙想"你知道吗？我们还是分头找

translation.en: -"You go this way. You go that way." -Right.
translation.zh: "你来这边，你去那边" 好吧

translation.en: Next thing you know, they lose sight of each other.
translation.zh: 接下来你知道他们看不到对方了

translation.en: All of a sudden, the guy hears some rumbling in the bushes.
translation.zh: 突然间其中一个家伙听到灌木丛里有声音

translation.en: -Sure. -He starts heading over that way.
translation.zh: -当然-他开始朝那个方向走去

translation.en: Out comes his friend in his orange suit. He's like, "Don't shoot. I'm not a moose."
translation.zh: 他的朋友身着橙衣从灌木丛里走出来说"别开枪，我不是麋鹿"

translation.en: And the guy readies his weapon, points it right at his face, and:
translation.zh: 另一个人备好了武器，用枪瞄着他的脸，然后...

translation.en: Shoots the guy.
translation.zh: 开枪了

translation.en: So the guy runs over, he goes, "What are you doing?
translation.zh: 于是他的朋友逃走，边跑边喊"你在干什么？

translation.en: "I told you I wasn't a moose."
translation.zh: "我告诉你我不是麋鹿"

translation.en: And the guy goes, "I thought you said you were a moose."
translation.zh: 另一个回答说"我以为你说你是只麋鹿"

translation.en: But he's not a moose.
translation.zh: 但是他不是只麋鹿

translation.en: Get the check-check from Shen-Shen. Let's get out of here.
translation.zh: 去申申那儿查查我们走吧

translation.en: Stop it. Stop it. Stop it.
translation.zh: 停下，停下，停下

translation.en: And cut.
translation.zh: 停
